Review Title: I would use it more if the Cashback Bonus Program reflected my spending habits
Review Text:
Look, Discover has great customer service, is a friendly brand and has pretty good tools (which are becoming standard).

My biggest complaint is providing cashback based on pre-determined categories of spending, which is not a personalized experience and definitely does not reflect my spending habits. What - I'm only going to get rewarded for buying items at Home Depot in the Spring? Silliness. I don't plan my spending on a quarterly calendar.

Because of this, all of my spending goes on my Amex Card, who rewards me for every purchase.

From a business perspective, this limited rewards program is probably hurting them more than anything. Seriously, I throw $5,000/month on my AMEX card. Money that Discover could have if only...

Review Title: Good card features, poor card design
Review Text:
The unorthodox design of the Discover It card (numbers not embossed, all card information on the back of the card) creates confusion for stores and employees overseas where unorthodox card designs are rarely seen. Employees will try to swipe the wrong end of the card and cannot take an impression of the card if networks are down. In addition, even though the Discover card can be used on a number of networks (JCB, Union Pay, etc.), the lack of insignia on the card mean there is no way for employees in Japan/China etc. to know that they can use the card on their local network. Finally, the lack of an EMV chip places Discover at a major disadvantage in the 21st century, as most countries worldwide have already moved away from magnetic stripe transactions.
Overall, I have been impressed by Discover's excellent customer service and a very useful website, plus the cashback offers (like 2% on all overseas purchases until December 31, 2014) are always appreciated.

Review Title: Discover IT Card Tottaly blows any other card out of the water!!!! PERIOD!
Review Text: I have been a Discover card member for a few months now, and it is absolutely awesome! The card benefits exceed any card in my wallet...by a mile..or two! I personally like: price protection, rental protection, special cash back offers for retailers, and the cash back for purchases! I just received $75.00 back for a home improvement purchase! I purchased a shed, and a few days after, I seen it cheaper by another retailer. I called, talked to a very friendly representative and they sent me the easy paperwork! A credit card that has your back up to $500.00 per item, to ensure you get a great deal...now that is AWESOME! The FEE FREE cash over at checkout is also a great feature!!! Simply put, you absolutely cannot get the benefits Discover offers, plus the world class customer service, even with a yearly fee card! A few weeks ago I was absolutely dumbfounded when Discover surprised me! I received a email from Discover saying I was being given a Starbucks card, so naturally I assumed FRAUD! I called Discover, talked to a clearly speaking gentlemen at a USA call center, and was informed it was a gift! Evidently Discover sends out little gifts occasionally to its card holders to remind them they care! I was floored...Now this is what I call actually caring for your customers! Sadly enough...soon after all this joy...I had to call Bank of America....about a Credit card issue...55 min later...my question was not answered, I had been transfered to 5 people, and my blood pressure im sure was a bit higher than it should have been....so...think of your health...think about the savings...and just do "IT" and get the Discover it card! I am making this my primary card for now on! This may sound to good to be true...but I am a real life customer, who desperately wants you to make the switch! You deserve it!
Best Card for building your credit score!! The rewards are good, but the amount needs to get to 50 dollars to be able to redeem it for account credit.

Review Title: Perfect Card for the Credit-Conscious Student
Review Text: Both as a computer science undergrad, and now as a law student, this card was and is the perfect card for my student lifestyle. I can pay my bill in seconds online, reap excellent cash back benefits for purchases I would have made anyway, and most importantly, constantly check up on my credit score. My relationship with Discover began simply as a way to initiate a credit history, and now it is my go-to card for most purchases. Yet access to the card has not encouraged me to overspend, but rather to have a heightened awareness of my credit worthiness and spending patterns. The excellent first impression Discover made upon me with its Discover IT card has almost certainly made me a lifelong customer.

I have always been happy with my Discover card, I have many cards to choose from, but my Discover card is the one I use the most. Thanks to the rewards programs and customer service perks my Discover It card has made me even happier with my Discover account.
Customer service is really good. They are very quick and responsive if you have any question/issue.
I love my discover it card I use it all year round at christmas I dol my christmas shopping with my bonus point.I also like the fact you can get exrs pointd different times in a year.
I love my Discover card. I work in a bank, and I refuse to switch credit cards!
good customer service, real user friendly when setting up your online account, no hidden fees, the only downside just you can't use it everywhere
Just love my Discover Card It Rocks Love it because it serves me right

For each and ever time you expect to utilize the 5% discount, you'll have to
i) log on to the website,
ii) get into the discount section,
iii) select the promotion which will take you back to the vendor's website and then you would get it (hopefully).
I just lost $50 because I didn't follow this tedious process for each and every transaction(approx 25) I made.

Totally disappointed and would probably stop using it or close it for good. BoA and Amex are at least straight forward, easy to use and they deliver on their promotions without trouble to the user.
I have other cards but the IT card is the one I choose first.

Easy to use! Rewards are great and easy to redeem. Along side the mobile app, the fraud protection has come in handy and is very fast! I was able to easily verify purchases and see all my transactions in an instant! Gives me the buying power I need when I need it!

Review Text: You have very high interest rates compared to other cards.

Simply the best card I have in my wallet......"That is whats in my wallet!" I haven't had one problem with my card. I do love the online and phone app. They have answered all of my questions and concerns. I cant say enough about my IT card.

The positive: Discover has outstanding customer service, decent rotating categories and outstanding services including a free FICO credit score, updated every 4 or 6 months. The payment date due is flexible and and there are no foreign transaction fees. The negative: Rewards cannot be redeemed until an amount of $50 is accrued. The cash back categories may not always suite a preference for a particular month.
The rewards are awesome. The card is great! Customer service is helpful.

The website is easy to use, and I go there often.

Review Title: Excellent Card, except needs to match MasterCard on Travel Beneifts for flight and hotel
Review Text: After much research, I would say this card is essentially the best for a complete mix of rewards, top tier customer service, its online account center is top tier, and yes I would recommend. I hate to give the built-in-benefits a 4/5 stars, but that is because MasterCard still beats Discover regarding travel protections on hotels and flights. essentially room theft insurance, and delayed flight insurance, and lost baggage insurance. If discover could top that, then I am obliged to give it 5/5 stars for all categories. Overall still net 5/5 rounded up.
5% cashback on gasoline should be forever cause we college students love going out. this is the only thing i don't like about this card, other than that its great.
I really enjoy being able to view all of my transactions, including details of each, online. Scheduling a pmt is super-easy and convenient! Best card I've ever had.

The option of having my credit score available each month is a big plus! While using my debit card I was not getting hardly anything back from the bank even through they told me i was getting rewards!! Excuse me, 5 or 6 cents! I have been using you guys for a couple of months now and my rewards is up to 140 dollars already!! Yes, I will be with you guys for a while!! Thank you very much!
Great all around card! I would recommend this cc to everyone!

I love talking with the customer service! They're always
very patient and helpful.

He also had my credit limit raised so I can use my discover card for my upcoming trip. I was extremely pleased with his knowledge and he was also very friendly and gave me exactly what I needed. I would highly recommend Discover .

Ty

One of the few companies that knows what customer service really is. The first thing you hear when you call is, "To speak to an agent, press 0" The other companies require you to punch in your account number, last 4 of social, zip code etc. When the agent picks up after 2 rings I'm on his / her screen. Discover knows me ! Every agent I contacted was knowledgeable and friendly.
This is one of the best cards I have ever had....too much to write about....the FICO score every month is a great thing.....

I wish there were more ways to get CashBack bonuses. Other than that, I love my card and plan on staying with Discover!

This is has excellent benefits and easy to use cash back program. Excellent customer service and online account management. my wife and I only use the Discover IT card. Cashback on all purchases and even more when you use it at the 100's of store approved to get 5% cash back. Love IT card.

My DISCOVER card is the first credit card I go when I want to charge something. The paperless statements is something I review once a week to what I have been spending my money on. You can set ALERTS to know as much about your card or as little as possible.

My experience with Discover has been phenomenal! Cashback bonus points are very convenient and get applied to things I actually spend money on, so I get paid for going about my normal, everyday life. As someone who had essentially no credit before I got the It card, I truly appreciate what having and using this credit card has done for my credit and the fact that I can track my FICO credit score right on the statement each month. I am happily seeing steady gains and a bright future for my credit. I have only called and required assistance from a Discover associate a handful of times, but those experiences were all 100% positive. The ability to talk to a real person who sounds like they actually want to help me is very refreshing these days. I would absolutely recommend Discover to a friend...or all of them!

Review Title: Replacement of ShopDiscover by Discover Deals
Review Text:
I consider that ShopDiscover was very good. Rewards was easy to find by 5%, 10%, 15% and 20% category. However, this have recently changed and the new Deals program have far fewer merchants than the previous program. For that reason, I use that card less often. Wal Mart is still is the list at 5% but we no longer find Groupon, Expedia, Hotel.com, Best Buy and many other.

The quaterly offer of 5% are good but I have also have the Chase Freedom card having almost the same category. Since I am a Chase checking account older, I get 10% annual bonus on all rewards that I got in the year so the 5% get to 5.5%. Would be nice to have similar incentive with Discover since I have a Discover checking account.

I also have the Fidelity Investment rewards card that give me 2% on all my purchase.

For that reason, I don't bring the Discover card in the store with me. I use it only for Wal Mart online purchase since the 5% is still there.

Overall, I like the Discover offering with the checking account and the card but hope the Shop Discover will come back - was much better.

Review Title: It Really Does Pay To Discover......
Review Text: I Love my Discover "IT", it makes buying on Amazon a breeze!

I do love the Discover Card and the rewards it provides. The rewards add up and can be used in a variety of ways. I prefer to use them to help pay the charges on my Discover Card. And, the special 5% back on specific purchases is always welcome.

As an older woman, getting a card in my own name was a bit difficult as I had no credit history of my own. Everything has been in my husband's name and joint for 57 years. But I'm on my way now to having a credit history of my own. Thank you Discover.
I have been using the Disocver card for past 3 months . Excellent custoemr service and prompt response to calls. One of the best Credit cards i have now!

hi, I just signed up for discover card and using it from last 3 months. After getting this card I have stopped using the other cards and its a big benefit- love the enhanced credit limit, casj back and all other stuff that matters..!

I love my discover card! Out of all the different cards I've had with various perks like miles or cash back, discover clearly is the best! They always answer the phone right away when I call and I can understand them! By far what I love the most is the cash back bonus. Obviously as the commercial says: "It pays to Discover!"
How fast the error is resolved and the courteous assistant from customer service.
Discover is now accepted almost everywhere. The customer service provided is great!! Getting cash back on things i needed anyways, also amazing!
Everyone I ever talk to at customer service is helpful and polite.

Review Title: People Answering Phones and Treating People Like People
Review Text: For a decade I have had a Visa card. If ever there was a problem (and there was always an issue every year), that problem would translate into an all-day affair on the phone, on-hold, questioning who worked for who (me for them, or them for me). I can't tell you what a refreshing experience it is to call Discover and make sense of this new card experience. The courtesy almost makes me want to just call the customer service line and chat with someone who is: a.) real; and b.) friendly. Who knew?! Thanks for taking the time to actually answer the phone. And thanks for the enthusiasm. It is good to not feel like a burden. Keep it up!
great benefits and customer service love the rewards program and they sent me a starbucks gift card for no reason !!!! awsome

Im glad I choose this as my first credit card. Being a new card holder Discover walked me through the entire process. From going over my credit report to actually using my card and build credit. I haven't heard from any other credit company that'll do all this for you. Oh, also not to mention, the rewards program is great!
Hassle free with purchases, wonderful customer service. Just love this card.
I love my new it card. The cash back rewards are better than a normal Discover card. I also like that you get a credit score each month.
Great card and great rewards. Use card for travel no problems great experience.
EASE OF USE AND GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!!! NEVER HAD AN ISSUE WITH THIS CARD.
EXCELLENCE OPTION FOR CREDIT CARD I AM SO HAPPY WITH MY DISCOVER CARD.
I like the fact that you can talk to a real person immediately when you call the customer service number.
This was my first credit card and it is so easy and perfect! I already have almost a $100 in cash back bonus. Discover really helps their customers in every aspect of the business. Great Company!
This is a new card for me, but thus far the benefits are pretty good.
I love my Discover IT card...I like earning rewards and being able to use that reward towards my statement. I will keep using it for that reason.
I like getting the reward point on this card. Also like that it shows my FICO score for free.

This is the best card in the world, and the quality of customer service is outstanding. I have referred my nephew and sisters, and I plan to tell friends and other family members. The cash-back incentives are awesome! So, I use my card for everything to earn money back.
I should have switched years ago but as long as they perform as they have so far I will not be switching anymore.
I got the discover card in April 2014 and never had a credit card this card it very nice and easily accessable

I have had the Discover card for about a month now, and I really enjoy using it. I like to get the Cash Back for everything that I spend, and the customer service is always spot on and greatly appreciated. You guys rock!!
love the fact that i am able to monitor my credit score.
went to Grand Cayman and mexico and discover card was great worked everywhere and was called to make sure it was me using my card not someone else thanks discover
I wish only to have more higher credit limit  Thanks

Review Title: The most hospitable credit card company EVER!
Review Text: I have had nothing but wonderful experiences with my Discover IT card. I am in the the hospitality and restaurant industry. I love to exemplify stellar customer service, which I am able to provide to my hotel guests on a daily basis. Due to the nature of the industry, I don't get too much time to go out to restaurants or other hotels to experience quality hospitality first hand. Discover employees are phenomenal! They allow me to experience the quality customer service 24/7. With Americans always on the go, and often times rushed when inquiring about billing issues or product information, it is so enlightening that Discover NEVER acts as though you are a nuisance or rushes you through something just so they can take the next call. This is by far the BEST credit card company. I thank Discover for everything, including the excellent cash back bonus program! Keep up the great work Discover!
Whenever I call, I am greeted with friendly voices! Thank you.
Great Card. I am finding I get more money back every month with Discover it and I reach $50.00 faster. With regular discover, I felt like I got nothing and it took forever to reach $50.00.
i love discover the rewards program is great and im just very happy with the card!
VERY EXCELLENT CARD.. PLEASE DONT CHANGE THE FORMAT

I really love this card the main thing is when I have any questions about anything I can call, I don't have to push a 1000 buttons to get a person, and I have always spoke with a person in the USA! Which is great. And they are very patient and accommodating. Thanks.

I have been a Discover member for over a year now, and the experience has been great. I enjoy the cashback bonuses, especially when it's for gasoline! My card was hacked around Christmas time, but Customer Service took care of everything and it was practically hassle free for me, which was very nice! I also really appreciate being able to see my FICO credit score each month... I doubt most credit cards offer that.
This my 1st encounter with Discover and so for it has been a very Positive Experience!! I can only hope it remains this way in the future.

Review Title: Overall one of the best free cards around.
Review Text: I am very happy with my Discover card. Bonuses/cashback are great. I once lost my card and customer service was prompt and helpful with getting me a new card and the old one immediately cancelled. I would and have recommended this card to others. The only downside is not every place takes Discover, so I do have a back up Visa card just in case.
excellent! great reward program you literally get cash back on what you spent.

I absolutely LOVE my Discover Card. It has helped me in raising my credit so much and the customer service is always so great and friendly. i just love you guys. Thank you so much for everything you do!
I love the Discover it Credit Card I have.It has a lot of good features. I recommend that card.Thanks Discover. Pedro from West Palm Beach
I love the cashback feature and the credit card score feature.

Been a member for many years. The customer service is why I stay. I can talk with a real person and they really are accommodating! I missed a payment and they waived the fee. I disputed a charge and they stood by my side. The customer service team actually has knowledge! I've never experienced canned script reading.
My discover card is the best thing ever for a college student!

Best service ever. Customer service outstanding
No gimmicks. Simply the very best

This is a very useful card that provides benefits to the card holder. I enjoy the quarterly benefit updates and it keeps me up to date with the status of my card. Won't leave home or office without my Discover Card
The customer service center does not seem scripted, which is simply amazing! The android app is very intuitive as well! Love the way this company has become.
Very good card great benefits easy to use. Web site is very user friendly.

Love this card, did not think that I would qualify for it but was accepted and I am on the road to rebuilding my credit history. I would recommend this card to anyone! I have received 2 credit line increases since receiving the card and and it is a great feeling to know that I have it if I need it!
I probably have not utilized all the features. Additionally, my buying patterns are different from the offers provided. However, that does not minimize the experience of using the card.
Love this card great for everything, customer service is very friendly and helpful and the privacy for it is awesome.

I love this card, it is my go-to and has so many benefits. Customer service is great, the online site is easy and functional to use, and I was even able to use cash back to pay for my purchases on Amazon. There are only two drawbacks; the first is minor in that it didn't recognize when I signed up for a promotional 5% cash back so I had to go back and resign, losing some cash back opportunities. The other drawback is steep; after my 6 month introductory APR it went up significantly. I was able to call and get it reduced by about 1% but with this being my main card I was disappointed with my rate. I have excellent credit and spending/paying habits and expected better from them.

The Discover It card has been the most hassle free card I have ever used. From the easy to understand and use website, free credit score, rewards program and fast approval time at stores. It is a joy to use!
Amazing card with amazing benefits... Discover it, love it.

Review Title: The Discover Card is the future
Review Text: Even though it isn't accepted everywhere, it is still the most convenient and user friendly card to have.

Thank you Discover for accepting me as a Discover Card user, love the rewards and the free fico score That I get every month. Love my Discover Card love the customer service, and I would recommend this card to any body. Thanks

Review Title: A Great Card For A Student
Review Text: When I applied as a student, I did not have any credit on record. Even without prior credit, discover instantly approved me. Over the last year, I have used my Discover It Student card to steadily build my credit while taking advantage of the superb cash back rewards program, online banking, and excellent customer service. I would recommend this card to anyone who wanted to responsibly build credit.
I opened a new card and got extra cash back bonus and I'm happy to start using the card.

Review Title: Very happy with my Discover IT Card
Review Text:
I converted my previous Discover Rewards card to the Discover IT card over a year ago. It is essentially the same service except instead of the rewards being a tiered percentage, I get the same percentage reward regardless of my monthly spending. That works much better for me.

Customer service is always great and very friendly.

I have been a Discover customer since almost their inception. I'm happy to be a Discover customer!
I think you should be able to redeem less than $50 towards your credit card like say $25.

Discover is great with the reward program, tailoring it to what I use most depending on the season. It is nice to be able to call customer service and talk to an actual person and get answers from someone knowledgeable and not have to be put on hold or talk to an automated machine. The It card is the only one I need in my wallet!
I use this card for everything. Getting rewarded for buying items is great, plus the 5% rotation is ideal for things that most people buy. FICO credit score for free is an awesome bonus as well.

I had some credit issues years ago and have been rebuilding my credit. Discover was kind enough to give me a card with a great introductory rate of no interest for over a year. The rewards are great, I get alot of cash towards Amazon. The customer service is excellent as well. There is never a hold time for longer than a minute, and the reps are knowledgeable and courteous. The website is very user-friendly also.
I have been a customer now with Discover for almost a year and I have not had any issues and have recieved awesome cash back offers. I would highly recommend Discover card! :)
I love this card. If I have a question the customer service people are friendly and always have the answers to my questions. It's the only credit card I use.
It's a great addition to your wallet or bill fold!
I really like the cash back bonus which I use to pay my bill. I also appreciate the no interest plan which is helping me pay off my debt faster. I will be a long time Discover customer.
My family has two discover cards and literally couldn't be happier. Wonderful rewards and helpful customer service. We will always have Discover!

I love the cashback program and the ability to see my credit score every month. My daughter wants to start building her credit, Discover It will definitely be her first credit card.

Many thanks Discover.

This is my first experience as a card-owner, but I am happy to report it has been nothing but splendid! There are great rewards, excellent customer service (yes, it is a real person), and easy to use online access/tools.
The reward program is very inviting. The service is excellent ..
One of the best cards around... Your customer service is the best this is one of the best cards that I carried in my pocket

I was looking to start a credit account about a year ago, and I looked into other companies, but Discover caught my eye with the IT card. Its cash back program is fantastic because no matter what you buy, you get a little bit back which can also be used on anything. I love this card and all of the features that come with it. I have not needed a new card yet but I like that a new card can be created with just about any design you want. I have not been late with any payments yet either but I value that Discover offers late payment forgiveness since sometimes money isn't always available to everyone at the right times. I would recommend that everyone get this card and start using it!
This is a good card, with great benefits. i like the features it has. However it does not always give you your credit score with every statement.

This was a great first credit card to learn how to be a responsible borrower and build a credit history! Easy terms that were understandable and great customer service support to help with the craziest situations!
discover card services are organized, smart, and valuable!
I am happy to be part of discover family, they will make sure you are taken care with utmost priority. And lovable customer care.

I think the card is great and I love that the next cash back bonus for the next quarter is on gas because that's what i put on my card all the time. I also love that you can see your credit score! The spending analysis broken up into categories is great too!
I appreciate the very professional phone contact you can get if needed.
great card..........Everyone should "Discover IT!!"

Subscribed for card but then a few days later they have a promo where you spend $X in 3 months and you'll get cash back. I called to see if I can be eligible for this but they refused.

Other than that card is good (cashback rewards, promos).
I find that I have had good experiences in all of my dealings with Discover Card.The personnel are always very helpful when I call for assistance.
online services should be upgraded in a better way....

Discover IT is the card I use most, simply because of the rewards program. The 4 seasons of rewards bonus categories fit let's say 3 out of 4 seasons for me. One of the other features I love most is the new monthly free FICO score -- that is superior and so beneficial. None of my other cards has it. Now it's included, love it!

I would have given a 5 star rating except I encountered a small coffee shop that did not accept Discover. Otherwise, I have been very pleased with this card. It has more benefits than any of my other cards. Great customer service. I apply my Cash Back bonus to my Amazon account.

Discover It offers great rewards, I love getting gift cards just for using my card!

The 5% quarterly offer on certain things is awesome!

I have only been a Discover card member for a few months...but let me say they are "over the top"!!!! What I mean is what my title says.....BEST OF THE BEST!!!!! I have quit using my other cards and will only use my "Discover It" card for now on!!!
Discover gives lot of options and rewards, they follow KYC very well. They allow to choose the desired due date which is awesome. Will ad have recommended this to many friends
I am really pleased to have this student version of this card. They offer real good cash rewards. It is best when you earn money for buying something.

I love my Discover Card. This card gives me more rewards than any other that I could find. The card itself is classy and durable, and after a year still looks nice. Though I've only made a few calls for help, I've been treated affably each time. I also love that Discover allows you to quickly convert your rewards to Amazon gift cards. It makes them so easy to use. I haven't had the chance to use the benefits yet, but I'm sure they are also very nice.
Overall, a perfect card for me. I'm a student, avid mountain biker, and Discover Card holder!

This is my first ever credit card and I have had it for the past 6 months and this card is great. Discover is accepted literally every where and I use it almost anywhere. The free FICO Credit Score viewer is amazing and let's me know that my credit is growing! One thing I wish was that it had 1.5% Cashback like the Capital One Quicksilver card does but I still enjoy the rotating cycles because for some reason I get excited to use my card and earn rewards which one day I hope to use and pay my bill. I love this card and I would recommended it to anyone as their first credit card or even their 7th credit card. It's great!!
Would like to see 5% cash back on stores like Walmart, also, department stores; not so much on gas.

Review Title: I Love my Discover IT credit card.
Review Text: This credit card has helped me in a life and its helping me go to college.
it does not get any better than this !! excellent card. great benefits, great rewards program. very easy to use online account center. this is the card to have....

I am so pleased when I call in that the call is answered promptly without having to dial X amount of prompts & being put on hold. I also appreciate the fact that my call is answered in perfect ENGLISH with no foreign accents. Everyone I have talked with has been very cheery and accommodating.
THANK YOU DISCOVER IT CARD line.

For years Discover was the only credit card that I carried. Recently I have been using other cards because of better incentives. With Discover incentives, I always need to mark my calendar for the 5% incentives and few mean anything to me. Sorry . . .
I hope I don't jinx it when I say i LOVE this card. It is my first credit card and i've had it for quite some time now. Great online access and customer support.

I love the opportunity that I am provided in speaking to a PERSON who is knowledgeable, courteous and easy to understand. The Customer Service at Discover is the best I have seen of ALL Card types.
I'm very happy with my Discover card. Great benefits, rewards. And customer service is over the top, never had such great treatment with any other company.
I have nothing but good things to say about Discover card.

I absolutely love my Discover Card. Outstanding customer care. I lost my card and had a brand new one the very next day. 5% cash back and easy balance transfers are no fuss at all. his is my favorite card due to their customer service which is above and beyond any other.

Love the Discover It card. I love the fact that you can use rewards points for gift cards or to pay down on your card balance. The Discover It web site is user friendly and provides easy to use card usage summaries and a wide variety of information options. Great card.
I love it. I don't even want to apply for other cards - everything I need I've got with Discover.
So much better as far as rewards go in my opinion Good riddance to the rewards tiers. Also, appreciate the quarterly 5% categories.
The quarterly bonuses could be more relevant, other than that the card is great.
The only card you'll ever want. ! Easy simple ! Customer service excellent !

I was unsure whether to apply for a new card, but this credit card has exceeded all my expectations. There is no regret whatsoever. FREE FICO score, a lot of benefits and rewards is just awesome. Easy to manage account online and on the app. If you are feeling unsure, just go for it! You won't regret it.
i will recomend this card to everyone is very useful and straight forward no hidden fees

I have been comfortable using the Discover Card and its online account access. Everything is good so far. I have a couple of other Accounts but for the simplicity I prefer Discoverer. The best thing is they provide the FICO credit Score and Spend Analyzer.

Discover IT card is hands down the best card that I have. With the added benefit of FICO credit scores and top notch customer service this is my go to card for my purchases. I will recommend this to anybody looking
really shows great benefits you can receive with this card.

This is my very first Credit Card as I am in college right now. Discover as a company seems wonderful to me and they are always to helpful! Review Title: Something that other cards should aspire to...
Review Text: Rebates, great service, convenience...what's not to like?

I love this credit card / Company. It gave me a chance to work on my credit as I hadn't had a card since having credit issues. Discover is accepted everywhere which made things so easy. If you don't have a Discover It card you're missing out. Get one soon.

Review Title: Good card with benefits as you shop
Review Text: It is one of my first cards and helped me in building my history with the advantage of getting cash backs which could be used to pay off the balance. I LOVE RECEIVING ALL THE EXTA BENIFTS AND BONUS POINT. I USE POINTS TO DONATE AT END OF YEAR.

I have had my Discover Card for a few months and am so happy that I signed up for it. The promotion was great, and the Cashback Bonus that it offers is really good. Good cash back ! Like all the other benefits too. !
Discover, was just my first and great discovery. and it still my best card.
Discover is an overall GREAT card to have. I love it

Love Discover and love the It card, I work in the credit card industry and I know quality when I see it. Discover has quality staff and invests in our country by keeping our call centers in the US. Great Card to have for everything. I would not use any other cards beside the Discover!
just get it now ,this credit card works great for me. im glad I got it.

Review Title: Best Card with the most benefits!
Review Text: Great customer service and excellent benefits. Its the only card I use!

Review Title: Great card with awesome customer service
Review Text: I love the Discover program. I was hesitant at first; I had a Discover card years ago and it was hardly accepted and always ran into problems. Today this is a GREAT card they really treat their members as just that (feels like a concierge service program). AND the card itself is super sleek and cook looking. Keep up the great job Discover!

Discover It card is a credit card for everyone. The online service by Discover is very user friendly! The app is also very convenient on the go! I have not taken advantage of the rewards program yet but looking forward to using in the near future.
The only "hiccup" I find is the card is not accepted in all places!
Overall very happy with my Discover It card!
Client Response 1: Glad youre liking our online service and Discover Mobile appwere all about making things easy for our Cardmembers. Definitely check out your Cashback Bonus. You automatically earn 1% on everything you buy. And every quarter, you can sign up to earn 5% on purchases in categories that changelike gas, restaurants and moreup to the quarterly maximum. So your rewards can add up fast. Sorry youve run into some acceptance trouble. Next time, tell the place you wish they accepted Discover. Theyll get the hint. Over 9 million other places did.

Review Text: I like that they have the Fico Score and when I call in there very helpful.
I am very pleased with the services that I have received whenever I had a question and had to contact customer service representators
The discover it card has a great reward system and easy to use online system. I love that payments are easy to make and the cash-back bonus program!

I don't use credit cards often I used mine for emergency's that I couldn't afford right away and im paying it off but now I use it for my gas my basic everyday things when I don't have cash on me. out of all of the other credit cards I think the best is a discover card. the % is kind of high but if you pay it off every month or get it down low its really good anyone who plans and manages their money id recommend this card over the others and if they aren't planning and managing their money id say not to get any credit card
Have been very pleased with my new IT card. Customer Service (once reached) have been helpful and answered all my questions. Very pleased with my card.
The Discover Card is being treated like I should be treated. It is wonderful. I am so thankful to have my Discover Card. Thank you so very much for the wonderful treatment.
I really enjoy having this card for many reasons: ease of access to your account, spending analyzer, free FICO score, amazing benefits, and monthly promotions. I highly recommend this card!
I m feeling like burrowing from family... I love it ... thanks
The only card i always choose to use but am disappointed when they don't accept it, however 90% of the time most places do take Discover.
this is my very first time having this type card not to sure what to look for overall thus far good
Client Response 1: Thanks for making us your firstand welcome aboard. You probably know theres no annual fee.  And that youre getting at least 1% Cashback Bonus on everything you buy. But thats just for starters.  You can sign up for 5% Cashback Bonus program on categories that change throughout the year, up to the quarterly maximum. And you get your updated FICO Credit Score free every monthonline and on statements. To get a real feel for all your card benefits, go to Discover.com and click Discover it Credit Card. And check out all the topics in the For Cardmembers section. Or ask one of our reps about your benefits. Theyre always ready to take your call day and night, right here in the U.S. Just call the number on the back of your card.

Review Text: very professional fast service pleasant to talk to

The customer service has been as good as you can ask for from a credit card company. I wish the cashback bonus was a little better and that you didn't have to reach $50 before you can cash it out, but otherwise Discover is as good as it gets!
Client Response 1: Glad to hear our reps are earning your praise. And that youve been happy with Discover overall. But lets talk Cashback Bonus. You might boost it by signing up for 5% Cashback Bonus every quarter. Thats 5% Cashback Bonus in categories that changelike gas, restaurants, movies, home improvement and more, up to the quarterly maximum. Plus, you can get 5%  20% Cashback Bonus at over 200 big-time online retailers through our shopping site. And 1% on everything else you buyno matter where. And you dont have to hit $50 to tap into it. You can redeem for $20 if you get a gift card from one of our brand partnersand there are over 150 to choose from. And you can start at 1 if you use your Cashback Bonus at Amazon.com. Whew! Hope this helps. And thanks for the note.

Review Text: The Discover It card has many features that have been particularly useful including the 5% cashback categories and the ease of redeeming my cashback. My favorite feature is that I have my card linked to my Amazon account and can use my cash back dollars there! Truly amazing, so glad I have it.
I like my discover it credit card, I would recommend it
I do like the online tools and easy to use web design.
I love the cash back. . .you get paid to buy stuff you are already purchasing!!!!
Wonderful service, customer service, and perks. Up to date website!
Love all the rewards, app, and knowing the location of customer service rep when you call.

As a 20 year old student who is transferring to a major university, I was in need of ANY company to give me a chance and build up some much needed credit. Before being offered the DISCOVER IT card, I applied at numerous companies, only to be turned down for a lack of credit. How can a young adult build up credit, if companies are not willing to take a chance on them?
If it were not for DISCOVER offering me a chance to prove that a young adult could be responsible with money, my dreams of going to a university wouldn't be achievable.

Thank you DISCOVER!
Client Response 1: Youre very welcome. Glad things worked outand that we could help. You can expect that same kind of treatment after you graduate too. Good luck in school!

Review Text: Discover is a premium card in my opinion because of it's reward program, customer service and exceptional web interface for accessing your account, making payments, free FICO score and suite of other services.
AWESOME CARD with great benifits!!! I use them on Amazon all the time!!!

Discover deserves to be given 5 stars! I love the rewards programs and the feature on amazon where I can use any credits I have. I think what really drew me towards opening an account was that I could view my credit score every month without having to pay or go elsewhere to find it. I also enjoy the spend analyzer feature. It really allows me to track where I spend all my money and keep organized.

Their only drawback is that it's not taken everywhere. As soon as they expand their business, they will be unstoppable. :)

I love the Discover It card. Especially the free credit score on each statement. It would be nice if they would include credit score(s) for additional cardholder(s), but I think it's still one of the best cards out there.

My first credit card was Discover. I have had it for 2 years now and I love it. The rewards are nice and the website is extremely easy to use and helpful. The staff at Discover customer service is also top notch. They are always friendly, helpful, and it helps that they are all native English speakers.
I have recommended this card to my friends and I'll continue to do so.

Having all of the major cards, I find Discover to be the best. It's mostly because of the fantastic customer service that is all domestic to the United States. Every agent to whom I've talked with even a simple question has been friendly, helpful, and a real pleasure.

As a commercial says (and it's not a credit card), if you're having more than one, be sure one is Discover!

Discover was the only card that would accept me with no credit. I needed a way to build my credit and this was my only option. Once I got my card and started using it, I fell in love with Discover. They are a great company to deal with and I have had no problems with them! I love my cash back bonus! It is a great way to save some extra money on things I would be purchasing anyways! I love Discover and would recommend it to anyone and everyone!
Is the best card that I've ever had. Is accepted everywhere. I would recommended to everyone!

I am satisfied, not a heavy user but when I want to use it, it is excellent. We always pay in full so not sure how you make much profit on us but keep it up and we will stay around.
Discover Card Customer Service is the best i have ever seen
One of the best reward cards around. Like that it is always trying to improve the customer experience. Especially like that the credit score is now provided and the running total its useful too.

Good all around. Especially good for young adults with no or limited credit. It offers no annual fees, and allows for significant savings. Promotional rewards are also easy to get and fast to your account. Very happy with my card. I recommend it to my friends who want to start building their credit.

As a young person, I find this to be an excellent card to build both my credit score, and also my experience working with a credit card company. There has been good customer service so far and the cash back program is fun, working off of the seasonal trends.
Great card, great services! Being able to use your rewards on Amazon is a nice bonus!

I have banked with most of the banks in the US and have used credits services through them and I have had issues with most of them and has had a lot of bad experiences through the banking systems - I find Discover on a whole to be the best of the best in banking, customer services, caring, considerate and understanding. I live in the New York area and was hit by the Super Storm Sandy and I remember calling Discover to ask to defer my interest rates on my card and if was done immediately, no ifs no buts. I have also been using their identity theft program and couldn't be happier every time there is activity on my SS# I am notified immediately. I travel overseas once or twice a year and whenever I rent a car my insurance is covered saving me that extra money for insurance. I also use their cash back rewards program of which I link it to Amazon and every month I am able to replace charges or something that my kids are always losing, and if I don't have something to replace I use my rewards as cash back to my card. I am so pleased with Discover Card I have never written a review before in my entire life because I am one of those people that will complain if there is a reason to ... but I can honestly say Discover Card is an amazing company to do business with it would be great if that had neighborhood banks though.
I like this card , bacause is good in everything. I love it.
I started building my credit history with discover it student card. I've been using this card for last 6 months. I got more than $100 as rewards.
Discover Bank's financial service is remarkable --- Discover Bank is one of the best decisions I've made in my lifetime!!!
card has great rewards, FICO score every month is a bonus, and cash back options change throughout the year
It is a great credit card to have. It gives you your credit score to view (monthly) without signing up with other creditors. It offers great benefits. I love this card.

I'm very impressed with Discover Card. I can now use the card in almost any location throughout the US ad online. I was so impressed my wife has card and we also applied and received company card. Nice to talk with someone on the phone should any questions come. This is a company that watches out for their customers.
One of my favorite features is the printed card number on the back of the card. It is easy to read especially for mobile transactions in any location. Good thinking, Discover!

Switched to the "IT" version because I did not like the graduated rewards process on my old card. LIKE IT!
I have been a satisfied user since the 80's and hope to continue for a few more years

I can't really think of any suggestion I can have for discover. It is great and I'm loving it!
so far so good! just opened my account and i love it.

Review Title: The only benefit is great customer service

I am very pleased with everything my Discover card offers me.
I have had the card a month and so far love it. Customer service was great, the mobile app is better than any I've seen and the FICO score is a nice touch. Over-all well done Discover!

This card gives you freedom and the support you need.
great card to have it has cash back and great rewards when useing the card

Always wanted to be a DIscover member, glad that I join them. I love the services, deals and the great level of promptness and expertise they provided. I can't say enough on expressing how great they are and I really truly recommend everyone in becoming a DIscover member.

Having a Discover card is great. They have worked with me when my pay day was changed and did not charge me a return fee when my bank changed my account number without notice. I would definitely recommend Discover.

I enjoy my experience with Discover. The customer service has always been helpful whenever I called. i am pleased with my card now, and I believe I made the right decision in applying for a Discover-it card. I wholeheartedly recommend it.

Everything is great;
reward are solid and competitive to most other cash back card programs. plus you can convert your cash back into even more cash through merchant gift cards; i.e. $45 redemtion turns into $50 gift card. plus you can earn more 5% - 20% through shop discover.

customer service is 10 stars! live US based people who understand what you are asking and you can understand what they are saying.

all these great features, services, and cash back all for no annual fee!

customer service rocks!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Review Title: Best choice I've made in a while
Review Text: This card is an amazing tool to have as a consumer. The benefits and protection it affords me let me shop with confidence.

My discover card is the best credit card I have! Not only is it great that I get cash back for making purchases, the customer service reps are fantastic! This card helped me build my credit back up after issues with other card companies, and I love the benefits! Would recommend this card to EVERYONE, I already have to my family and friends!

I was a previously disgruntled Discover Card user but the IT card brought me back and I love all the new features. Most recently, the running balance so I can see my balance as I go. Plus the credit score is awesome so I can see my standing. Get the IT card from Discover!
I have had nothing but a good experience with this card from customer service, to changing my due date so it will be more convenient to make my payment and ensure it arrived before it is due..

Like all other cards, the cashback is only as good as what you save money on. Each quarter has pretty good qualifying purchases except spring. I can't be the only person who doesn't shop at home improvement stores.

Customer service is excellent, chat on the website is pretty quick, and phone support is great to speak to people here in the states!

Website is clean, things are easy to find and well laid out.

Rewards are decent. I wouldn't say they're any better or worse than competitors.

Definitely would recommend Discover to a friend :)

I have never had any issues with my Discover card, including my experience with customer service. I love the benefits that come with this card, and I really love the ability to check my FICO credit score by just looking at my statements!

Review Title: Nothing special, no recommendation from me
Review Text:
This credit card has a 1% cash back bonus which was only implemented within the last year. The 5% bonus options are very random and almost never applies to any stores or services that the average consumer uses.
No sign on bonus, no perks to speak of. I wouldn't recommend this card since there are MUCH better cash back cards out there with better APR'S.

I open my discover last year, and I am so impressed I alreday received $50 for being a member as a student I count every penny and discover save me every time I go to gas station and when Buy things I love discover I am so glad I got this card.

I like new card and design. It was easy to switch from old to the new card. Also, chose card because of credit score information. I like being able to keep an eye on my credit without going to other sites.

Thanks!
Have had other cards, but always seem to use Discover

I am very disappointed at the amount of my cash back bonus. I spend $1000 to $1200 monthly and my cash back is less than $10. This doesn't seem accurate for all of the advertising about how much you can receive. I pay the full amount charged each month.
Client Response 1: Sorry youre disappointedthats not the experience were aiming for. Lets see if we can fix it. Try signing up for 5% Cashback Bonus every quarter. Thats 5% Cashback Bonus in categories that changelike gas, restaurants, movies, home improvement and more, up to the quarterly maximum. And you can get 5%  20% Cashback Bonus at major online retailers through our shopping site. Of course, youll still get 1% on everything else you buy. So your Cashback Bonus should start adding up. Check it all out in the Cashback Bonus section at Discover.com. Or call one of our reps at the number on the back of your cardthey love talking about Cashback Bonus.

Review Title: They want to run your credit report.
Review Text: I really don't want companies running my report if I request an increase. Running your report decreases your credit score. They ran it once, it was good enough to get their card. Why can't they use your payment history with them?
Client Response 1: Thats certainly a valid question and concern. The fact is not every credit line increase requires a Credit Bureau report. If you ask for a credit line increase by phone, our rep will tell you if we need a new reportand ask you to confirm youre okay with it. Thanks for sharing your thoughts.

Review Text: Discover It is a good card, but dont like that other than the rotating categories, you only earn 1% cash back. There should be higher cash back bonus for gas, groceries all year round. Also, dont like that you cant get a running total of your cash back bonus like most cards, but have to wait until the next billing period. on the plus side, reasonable APRs and good customer service.
Just opened the account, we are happy with it. and will recommended.

Review Title: The best card I have ever owned!!
Review Text: I really enjoy my Discover card. I really love the 5% cash back on gas. Also, I talked to my financial advisor who I have been with for about 5 years now and my credit score has increased gradually by having a good line of credit with Discover.

Review Title: Discover is a great credit card
Review Text: What I like about Discover is when I call to speak to a Representative, I do not wait on hold. They answer the phone immediately plus, they are very courteous when speaking to them. Also, the rewards program is great!! I have recommended this card to others. Discover is a more personalized credit card.

Review Title: Our Discover Card has been our "ONE & ONLY" for years!!!!
Review Text: It is nice to have only one GREAT credit card for our monthly purchases. So time saving to make out one check a month and have super records for future references.

The Discover card is phenomenal. I have always received excellent customer service and the rewards are amazing. I earned $200.00 dollars for referring four of my friends. A customer can earn up to $500.00 each year for referring his/her friends. There are also great cashback incentives when you shop online using ShopDiscover. I earned 10% cashback when I purchased a lawn mower online from Sears. Discover is by far one of the best credit cards out there. When I traveled abroad, I did not have to pay foreign transaction fees. There are so many other perks associated with the Discover card. It is too bad that other banks are copying Discover's incentive programs. I did not rate the Discover card excellent because I would like to see a running tab of my cashback rewards as I am using my card during each billing period. The tab includes the transaction date, amount spent, and the rewards earned from that transaction. When the reward is in a bonus category, that should be stated as well. I would prefer to see running tab as I am using my card during the billing period rather than on my next statement. Currently, the cashback portion of the statement is not clear. If what I stated above cannot be done, the cashback portion of the statement should be itemized so that the customer can clearly see what he/she earned from each transaction.
I love having the discover it card. Anytime I have any questions, I can give Discover a call and they always help me with what I needed. Great job keep up the good work.

This card is great for people who are starting out and would like to build credit while also being rewarded for being responsible. Customer service is great, benefits are great, and getting an opportunity to build credit is awesome! Thanks.
Discover has been very dependable in meeting my changing needs for credit.

Review Title: I love my Discover it card!!!
Review Text: This is an amazing card! I love the rewards program!!! I would definitely recommend it to my friends....in fact, I already have!!!
Card was easy to get the only thing i did not like is that i did not quailify for 14 months no interest.
Best way I can put it, in short, I talk to a CSR within 2 minutes every call, I enjoy the benefits, I quit using other cards. Thank you.

I have had my card for about 7 months now and I have yet to have a bad experience. Because it involves a credit card company, this is saying a lot. The online services are easy to use and work consistently. When I receive messages and alerts they are always timely and clear.
Then there is the rewards program. It is fantastic! I use my card for all my purchases to rack up the most cash back as possible and then pay the card off before get charged interest. I have been surprised at how fast I am getting cash back. The best part is how the cash back can be used. In addition to having in accredited to my account or using it on Amazon, there are partnered companies that allow you to use your cash back to get gift cards that are of a higher value than your original bonus. They also sent me a Starbucks gift card in the mail with a not that read, "This is on us." I haven't even touched on all the things I like but I think it is already clear that I am very happy with my card.

Discover's customer service is bar-none, the best I have ever experienced! They answer all questions/concerns with speed and accuracy, and I always get a human on the phone, not a stupid call tree. (I'm young, but I still prefer working with a human than a machine.) Overall, the experience has been great! Thanks Discover!
I love the online ability to monitor everything. WOW about the FICO score, I even love your commercials. Keep up the fabulous work. Thanks.

I have recommended this card to my friends and family.

Review Title: The best I have ever had.

Very handy card and widely accepted. I even paid my plumber with it! Can't beat that with a stick!!!!!!!
Good website, easy to understand statements and to control your expenses

I absolutely love my Discover it Card!! :)
Their customer service representatives are always friendly and readily available with very little to no wait time
They have wonderful rewards and incentives that keep loyal customers like myself. They even mail me $5 Starbucks gift cards just to thank me for being a great Discover card member!
I would definitely recommend this card to anyone looking to get a credit card
great costumer service always there when you need a hand I love the fact that I dont have to deal with the automated system and no waiting in the line Great benefits and rewards

We have had the card since 1987, when it was part of the Sears credit card system. We were very happy users for many years, and moved all of our business from our AMEX cards which we'd had since 1976. In recent years we have seen the program change. First was the cash back redemption changed from $25 to $50. We were told this was due to the Banking crisis in 2008, but the crisis has been over for a while but the amount hasn't been brought back to the original $25. Then there was the change to when the billing cycle closed and payment was due. Originally this was the same date. A couple of years back a 5 day spread was introduced. The reason - other cards operated this way. We always thought DISCOVERCARD tried to be different. The final straw was the elimination of the one time card number for use on the internet. I'd asked several times to hear back from management about this and told the customer service person that if I didn't hear back from someone in management we would stop using the card. Well, we have basically stopped using it and moved all of our business back to our AMEX card. We find we get are even getting back more cash back than we were getting with DISCOVERCARD. At this point DISCOVERCARD has not provided us any reason to come back.

This is one of my top three most frequently used cards. Sometimes the 5% cashback reward categories aren't great for me, so I won't use it much then. But when the 5% category is say, online shopping? Great way to get a bit of cash back for holiday shopping. 1% back on everything else isn't the best out there, but still better than nothing.

The online center is one of the best I've seen for a credit card. Every now and then it'll take me a minute to find what I'm looking for, but in general, it's much more intuitive than some I've seen for my other cards.

My biggest complaints are that you need $50 in rewards in order to get statement credit, and that you can't pick your card image. Neither is a big deal, just something that could be better.

I have this card since the last six months and I just love Discover's Customer support and their responsiveness in handling all the customer concerns!
I would definitely recommend this card to friends.

Review Title: YOU WOULD HAVE TO SEE FOR YOURSELF TO BELIVE IT!
Review Text: Great customer service, benefits and just experience as a customer.

Cash back options are great, but Discover could do something more with rewards. Living in NYC, I don't care about the cash back from gas purchases for example. Be nice to have some balance. Otherwise, great company, great card. Love it.

Great Card, accepted every! Had to open a dispute for fraud and got an instant credit for the amount that was charged. i received confirmation from customer service that it was being taken care of and confirmed that it was not me and in fact a fraudulent charge. After a week or so I notice that the credit was reversed and the charge was back on my account (without any notification). I then had to go through the entire dispute process again which was then eventually taken care of. Other than that I haven't had any issues.

I like the changes/additions you have made to the Discover card. The credit score is a nice plus. Also, the running balance is a very informative feature. Keeps me appraised of that information, in addition to the pending transactions. I am able to keep tabs on both features while viewing them on the same page. Some of the features I do not use, like car rental and flight insurance but for my needs, the Discover card works very well for me. Keep up the good work!
There is nothing else to say about discover except that it is flawless!

My Discover card has allowed me to experience awesome things since I first got it. My dad made me get a credit card my sophomore year of college and I wasn't very fond of the idea (managing money, paying bills), but Discover has made it so easy and gives back to you in so many ways. The cashback rewards are amazing and I just watch them add up with every bill I pay. Couldn't have chosen a better credit card to start off with and build my credit with.
Thanks Discover!

I've seen tons of friends throw money away to credit card fees and late payments. Ultimately, there's no point in having a credit card if you lose a lot of money because of it. The reason I chose the IT card is that it is a good rewards card with no fees. With a little financial responsibility I'm making money by having this card. Very solid...and you can't deny the card looks pretty cool.
Iphone app makes it easy to watch my spending. Its a great first card to build credit

The online account center is quite difficult to understand. I typically do not make many charges to my account but the past few months I had to charge some bigger items, causing me to frequent the site a bit more lately and also review my account homepage more closely. I have had to call and live chat with representatives a few timesnot always receiving answers to my questions. The online account center is really difficult to maneuver and I have had a few ghost charges that are being charged but don't show up in my transactions, affecting my balance multiple times. I wish this didn't happen, and that the account center was more transparent about charges!
awesome for my emergencies, which happen a lot with a little baby and recently moving. awesome rewards and would definately recomend.

Not too long ago, I purchased some eye-glasses from a popular department store. After the lens fell out and was lost, the vision department manager refused to replace it without an additional charge. She also refused to return my purchase. I called Discover and disputed the charges. After I informed the manager that I started a dispute, she credited my discovercard. This was after she said it could not be refunded. I love Discover's purchase protection!

Review Title: Big fan of my Discover IT card
Review Text: I love that I get a live American person when I call and I don't even have to ask for him/her. I also like the credit score availability. The cashback promotions are fun. I enjoy the giftcards that I get with my rewards.
so far no complaints great customer service great rewards program
The rewards are fine but they have to be picked every month or two. Would be better if you have a cash back like 4% on everything.

Review Title: The Best Credit Card to own is Discover Card!
Review Text: I have been with Discover Card for 28 years and I would never want to be without it! I love the benefits of this card, the customer service and feel no other credit card measures up to Discover! I recently switched to Discover IT card and this has even more benefits! If there wasn't enough to start with in the first place?? They only made it better. I tell everyone I know to get Discover Card! Forget the rest!

I have been happy with my Discover Card for years. As a bonus, adding my two children to my account helped build their credit.
