had card for years , never had a problem. Very easy to navigate ,check old bills , etc.
Excellent job.the best so far among services. I believe on u guys.i will always recommend ur company to friends
Really pleased with my card experience. Love account limit alerts, love FICO score report!

I have been a member since 2006. The customer service has been great most of the time. The only problem I have sometimes is with the posting of charges and credits being done right away, which causes problems with balancing my account. That is the area that needs more improvement. Also, I wish that I did not have to go through Shop Discover in order to get cash back awards. I thought that just by using the card would be sufficient. I just don't like having to log in to do it. It is crazy that Discover gave me 3 times the credit line of Wells Fargo VISA, of which I belong to their bank and also had a mortgage with them. I eventually closed the account since they did not want to give me cash back on time. So, I recommend Discover Card over all the rest!!!

Being as this is the first and only credit card I've ever had, I can't really compare it to other ones out there. That being said, it has been a great card for both myself as well as my fiance and the cash back rewards is a wonderful perk!
best service and very pleasent when i call them. thank u for the service

Great Rewards program, cash back deals!
Great customer service too.

Review Title: IT's like having a friend who cares
Review Text: I have been a customer for years. I have stayed a customer, because I am always treated with respect. My questions get answered quickly, my concerns are handled efficiently and when I call for help I receive a friendly and compassionate agent. Best Credit Card to hold in my wallet.
easy to schedule an online payment and it applies to my account quickly too.
Love this card. Each month I look forward to viewing my Fico score! The rewards are great! Discover you are the best!
This has been the best card I ever got! They offer many benefits that some other cards dont offer. Also everytime that I called about the card the staff has been friendly and helpful.
I love my discover card. I started with the Discover Student Card. It was very helpful. Now I have the Discover IT Card. I love the benefits I receive and the great customer service. Thanks Discover!
I use this card as a backup for business travel. Great to have if incidentals arise!
Would never advise anyone to get this credit card- terrible offers and customer service.

Review Title: A Super Great Card To Have
Review Text: Excellent customer service!!! A must get card!! :)
DiscoverIt daily rewards at 1% are better than the More Card at .25%.

I have been a member for approximately 9 years. I have had to contact Discover several times. Whatever I have needed has always been handled professionally, and timely, if not immediately. Also love all the on-line things I can do that save me time.
Discover has always been my favorite credit card and it just keeps getting better

Review Title: Great benefits and the best customer service
Review Text:
The minimum earning level is now set at 1% cash back, which makes the card very competitive. When you go to redeem your bonus, you will find lots of opportunities to redeem your cash back bonus for gift cards with higher values than the value you are redeeming, actually making the bonus worth more than 1%. When you need something that aligns with the rotating 5% bonus categories or ShopDiscover offers, the card becomes too good to be true.
If you ever have an issue, call customer service right away. They are the most helpful and competent card issuer I have ever dealt with. They will help and they actually know what they are doing.

Review Title: a good credit card to use for anything
Review Text: Discover it is my go to card for just about anything. It has low rates, no fees, good rewards and great customer service.

So far I like Discover. All the departments connected to customer assistance that I have contacted have been very helpful. Their commercial is true they treat you like you treat you. No problems with it as of yet.
The benefits and the account experience are great!

You should really "Discover" this card,,,haha.
It is a great card, with great cashback and great customer service. And especially, it has no annual fee!
Discover It was my first credit card ever and it was a great way to start building my credit. Everything about Discover is easy and simple.
I have had no problems at all with the "It" Card. "It" works great.

It's so nice to speak with someone one can understand! No language or culture barriers. My rep was in my own city, stated where they were from and more. Very professional, courteous and helps accomplish what is needed.

This was the first credit card I have ever owned and I love it. Everything is very easy and efficient to pay your bills online and the cash back bonuses can be used very effectively. I would recommend it to a friend.

Review Title: Not your typical first credit card.
Review Text: I opened a Discover Student Rewards about 5 years ago and have loved using it and earning rewards. Although I have built up credit, I am not going to get rid of this card. One of the best rewards cards out there if you remember to sign up for 5% cash back. 1% back on everything that isn't on the 5% calender is OK at best but 5% from the categories on the calender is hard to beat.

Discover Card seems to do everything any other card promises! The freedom from limits that other cards talk about doesn't apply to me -- I never come anywhere near mine. The interest rates don't matter, either. But I do love and use the cash back, especially when I am shopping on Amazon! There really does seem to be such a thing as "free money"! Additionally, the people at DC have always answered any questions in a friendly and professional way and they have solved my small problems professionally and usually in my favor. They have earned my loyalty.
This is very nice card. Have a good credit limit. Having good rewards with the card and have discounts on lots of things
Great card, have made it my everyday card because of the cash back benefits.

As a student starting out on my own in the world, I am grateful to be able to understand the importance of good credit and the impact it can have on one's life. Finances and credit can be a very daunting thing. Discover has been a great tool for a beginner because they are supportive in recognizing my credit-building endeavors and I feel as though they want to be helpful in seeing me succeed financially instead of side-blinding me with hidden fees, rules, etc. Instead, I have been rewarded for good credit management. It is accepted everywhere I go. The phone app also makes it incredibly easy to keep track of spending and make payments on the fly! I do everything through the app! Loving Discover so far.
My go to credit card! I've referred my friends and family and they love it too.

My husband and I started using our Discover card in Nov 2013. We have a zero interest rate until next year and it really helps, we can make bigger monthly payments. But the thing I really love is that when I call Discover the people are friendly and very helpful no matter what my problem is. The customer service is the best!
Great Service for a credit card. Any problem is handled quickly.

The only reason why I got the Discover card was because I wanted to start building up my credit score. I was told by a good friend that Discover was a good card to start with. Low but fair credit line. They started off great because I got accepted the discover card with my fair credit score. A month or so has passed and I could not be happier with Discover. It really is a great card to start off with and I will continue to use it. It has really helped me with not having to live paycheck to paycheck. Great customer service experience every time and you can choose your due date.

Great employees who care about you as a client! The fact that you have to wait until $50.00 in rewards is generated before cashing it in is a little annoying. Overall, great card with great benefits (most importantly with the agents we speak to on the phone). Discover really trains and hires great employees!
Love this card! Customer service is Johnny on the spot.

Review Title: I would and have recommended discover it for students.
Review Text: As a student, it was hard to find a good first credit card. This one allowed me to miss my first payment without a jump in my APR (which I haven't had to test yet), and allows me to see my account and interact with it as I choose online. It even allowed me to skip the lines at an amusement park with family, and my bonus helped me buy textbooks on Amazon this semester . When my wallet was stolen, the card services were fast and easy to postpone when I wasn't sure where it was, and easy to stop and replace the card once I realized someone else had possession of it. The best part was that my credit line grew with me at a good pace, so when I had to buy an unanticipated camera for a class, I had the funds necessary to do it since my card limit had recently been extended. Discover It is phenomenal, and if you're responsible enough to get a credit card, this might be a great one for you.

Review Title: One of the few best cards in market
Review Text: One of the few best cards in market. Hassle free & excellent customer service.

I have always used Discover Card. The cash back bonus program has been great. The only issue I ever had with Discover was when I tried to obtain a credit line increase back during the ~2008 bank loan freeze. I was very disappointed when Discover would not grant me an increase (this was in 2009). I was having a construction project done and wanted to use my Discover Card, but wanted to make sure I had enough credit line. Seems odd that they wouldn't grant it when my income was more than sufficient and I have ALWAYS paid my balance in full. Outside of that Discover has been great, customer service fantastic.

DISCOVER HAS THE BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE NATIONWIDE
AND THIS CARD HAS OUTSTANDING BENEFITS. THIS CARD WILL BE THE ONLY CARD YOU WILL EVER NEED.
Of all my credit cards and banking experience, Discover has the best customer service hands down!
I've had this card for over 15 years and the rewards have changed a couple times but this is the best I have had. Thank Discover!

Ever since becoming a customer of Discover It, I have been treated with respect and excellent customer service. I consolidated 3 debts into 1 using Discover's money transfer method and have saved money on a monthly basis by doing just that. Discover has given me another chance to increase my credit score and so far I will not use another credit card to do my purchases so conveniently. Thank you Discover It.

I got this card as a college senior because of the no interest promotion on purchases. It's been about almost two years and it's still my go to card out of my four. The design of the card is very unique as well. I actually catch myself checking it out as I pay for things even though I've had it for a long time. And compared to other cards, this company has the quickest customer service, those commercials on tv weren't that much of an exaggeration. The only con is that the quarterly 5% reward categories barely apply to the recent college grad crowd (20-24) so I'm essentially getting just %1 back in rewards the entire year which makes that cashback bonus grow kind of slow.

Card designs are the best, especially the image of an 'old' cassette tape shell on the front. I wrote my favorite artist name and music album in the 'white' space for personalization beyond any other card! Great idea, Discover!!
The only feature I would expect that isn't currently provided on the IT card is automatic sign up of 5% Cashback bonuses when available each calendar quarter. I can't imagine anyone truly NOT WANTING the extra bonus?!? I think it would be the ONLY card to offer that feature, and truly be the real IT card
Best credit card I've ever had. Having good credit really does have rewards.

Great card - great benefits!

I've been a member for a bunch of years and now my son is as well!

Going for a Weber Grill with my cash back bonus!
i love the card, so easy to use and accepted everywhere

I have been a Discover card member for mega years. I switched to the "It" card this year and I am earning even more rewards (super program). The Discover Card is by far my favorite card and it is used almost every day for everything.
I really like my card. The website and it is accepted everywhere. Thanks
I'am happy that I switched to Discover It Card. Great Cash Back Bonus Program.
It's very convenient. I'm glad that I DISCOVER this card. Thank you for this opportunity

Online experience is great. I have no problem with the customer support however, a few were not able to cater to my inquires. Card does not allow balance transfer checks. For build in rewards Chase Freedom is better. Discover is only good for those looking for high credit limits.

upgraded from the Discover Platinum to the Discover MORE card recently. Must say rewards are even better. Having a built in FICO score is very helpful. Online account features are great. It is also great that Discover monitors for fraud which in many cases will alert before there is a problem. Best Card I ever had. I only feel comfortable using Discover.
I have used this card for 90% of my o\purchases. It is great, I love the security features

I use my Discover card as much as I can. There are very few places that it is not possible. They get my business only once. The "Rewards" are great. Convenient to be able to use only one card instead of having a "bushel" of cards in my wallet. Thank you
Never have had a problem with Discover. Just wish I would have acquired this card years ago.
Discover is great wish it was accepted in Bermuda and overseas.
Discover has always been my family's favorite card. I absolutely love the Discover IT card. Great benefits!

Review Title: My go to for online shopping
Review Text: This is my go to card, especially for shopping online. Great benefits, excellent customer service... so many ways to save.
this is an excellent card with even better benefits. i would recommend this to anyone
I love the card ....ABSOLUTELY LOVE THE DISCOVER IT CARD
the best feature for me is being able to access my account online from any where at any time, helps me verify transactions, balances, and overall better manage my account
I am very pleased with my card and I would recommend Discover to friends.
Provides useful extras (FICO Score), good rewards program, and great service. Definitely recommend Discover. I even have my Checking account with them!
After having credit cards for over 30 years this is by far the BEST and most wonderful experience I have had. So glad I made the switch!
Great customer service, have had a Discover Card since 1988, never a problem.

Review Title: Discover offers the best customer support .
Review Text: i been with Discover for one year and counting.i love the cash back rewards program that you get with the card.I dont leave home with out it.Very great credit card, i will recommend it to any one thats looking for a brand you Can trust.#1 Discover
not much to discover from the older Discover. Seems same to me, longer renewal date, other then that, nothing to loose sleep over.....zzzzz

I have been a customer almost from the beginning and use Discover almost exclusively. The customer service is outstanding and cash back is always welcome. I have never had a problem (practically no problems at all) that wasn't resolved easily and to my satisfaction. Discover is always my first selection when I make a charge purchase.

I have 4 credit cards and I probably use this card the most out of all 4. I've dealt with the customer service about two times and both times they've been extremely helpful and courteous. I also love coordinating with their Twitter account, they even sent me free tickets to Six Flags! I've also received a free $5 gift card to Starbucks to show their customer appreciation. I don't receive any of these benefits or types of interaction with my other credit cards.
great credit card with lots of benefits! It is safe, and helps you build credit!
love cash back need more benefits like travel breaks

I totally underestimated this card for the last couple of years. After I really compared both form and function I have been a converted user. Discover's focus on superior customer service is second to none. I love the fact that I can call up customer service from any phone number on my account and they know who I am (yes i still have to answer security questions) but the days of entering your account information (16 digit card number, billing zip, and birth year) are over! So easy.

Then there's the benefits of a good APR and good cash back bonus.

I am so happy to be a Discover Card user.

I've had a card since they first came out when not everyone took them
I like the cash back bonus and now your credit rating and now everyone takes the card great card good company

Enjoy using my Discover Card for everyday purchases and school tuition and ordering books. The customer service was good when asking for credit line increase.. Would recommend Discover card to anyone who asked and friends too.
Great card and cash back has a lot of flexibility.
is the best card you can have i love it i would tel family and friends

My wife and I love to save money & enjoy eating out. We use our Discover card points to earn prepaid cards to restaurants. At least 2 meals a month on Discover! We even have the cable bill auto charge to our Discover, so we earn points without effort and make 1 less payment a month. Great card to have!
I am giving you 2/5 for Online Account Center because it would be extremely nice if there is an option to sort the results by price, when searching for a specific products.
rewards are great and so is credit score feature .

Ever since we've been using our Discover It card, we have been extremely happy. We use it for both big and small purchases including all of our family necessities. We appreciate the security in fraud protection and great customer service (which we've rarely used due to the high quality in your company). Thank you for creating an awesome credit card!

Had this card for just over a yr and received an email stating that my credit line had been increased! I love the benefits of the card but most of all I love their customer service!!! I would definitely recommend Discover to a friend.

Graham
Best Card ever I love my Discover card If i had to give up all my credit cards and keep one it would no Doubt be my Discover card i Love the Benefits they offerand there customer service is top notch
I have so many choices with the cash back bonus, which is much better than my other credit cards.

just need to remove the caps on promotional earnings and it would be the best card out there. You essentially already do it through shop discover. Why put a limit on the quarterly promotional earnings if rewards are going to influence my card selection?

Review Title: Extremely blown away with the quality of Discover.
Review Text: So happy I finally got a Discover card.. the grass isn't always greener, but in this case, it IS! I thought I was happy with my Delta Skymiles card.. it doesn't hold a candle to the service quality that exudes in everything Discover. Very very impressed!
A credit card with great benefits. I have not needed the 24/7 travel assistance, but all and all I Love it.

I absolutely love Discover Card and use it almost exclusively as my card of choice to charge items. However, I have a suggestion for improvement. I like to get a summary of the different types of charges on my account and most of items are correctly categorized, however, there are a number of transactions that are place in the wrong category. For example when I got to the grocery store to buy food, the transaction is categorized as merchandise and it is not. Is this day of computerized everything, I believe that somehow someway these items could be categorized correctly.
I've recommended this card to multiple friends. They got the card and are very pleased with it, as am I.
Great to do buisness with great customer service very nice rewards
I loved the traditional Discover Card, but I saw a few ads for Discover It and called about upgrading. The process could not have been easier and I love the credit score monitoring!
Good basic card with no frills or headaches. Customer service is excellent.
I love this card, the rate is great and it has some awesome features. I wish they woud allow me to sign up for credit protection.
The website is easy to navigate and the rewards program is great!
Excellent online account management; Enjoy the free FICO score
Good card, easy and hassle free to use. Good service response.

I've been a loyal Discover card holder for many years and unlike other financial institutions, Discover's customer service and rewards have only continued to improve. Their customer service online or over the phone is outstanding; they are friendly, helpful, and extremely efficient in answering questions and fixing issues. I couldn't be happier. Keep up the great work!
This is a very student friendly card. Also this is the card with the least hassle, I have seen so far, from applying to using to the benefits program to payments. The reward program is very cool.
I love the cashback and rewards! I hardly ever used credit cards until this Discover card. I also love the website and the app - super easy to navigate and make payments on either option.

My experience with Discover has been fantastic! From the Rewards program to Customer Service, I've never had a bad experience. When my card numbers were stolen, the Customer Service rep immediately shut down my card and a new card was issued and received within days. In addition, all unidentified charges were immediately removed from my account.

The best Discover it benefit - my free monthly FICO Score!

I really like the Discover It card and the cashback program. I also am very pleased with customer service, and the user friendly website. I like that I can choose promotions each month to receive higher cash back rewards for things I need to purchase anyways. Keep up the great work Discover!!
Just the design itself makes you want to have a Discover card!! the option to log in via the app with a 4 digit pin is amazing, and the cash back program is awesome! thank you Discover
Excellent Customer Service and entry benifits! My favorite Credit Card so far!

I have always kept a Discover card for the "Cashback" and a Visa/Mastercard for locations that don't take Discover. I had a Chase rewards card and found their customer service to be abysmal. I canceled the card after three months because 1. I needed to contact customer service so soon after opening the account and 2. Their customer service genuinely seemed disinterested in resolving their error promptly. I had a CapitalOne "rewards" card and found that their "rewards" seem generous, but are elusive and difficult to realize. If I wanted to jump through hoops or solve calculus equations I would have become an acrobat or physicist, not sign up for a CapitalOne card.
Discover has always been easy to redeem rewards and always extremely prompt and helpful on the phone. I wish they would have been more proactive about contacting me to upgrade to the IT card though. I love that Discover IT provides your FICO score. FICO scores and credit reports should be free to everyone, at all times, anyway. Paying to see your credit report is like paying the town gossip to tell you what rumors he/she has been spreading about you. Seeing my FICO score and the basic description of what's determining it is like having a friend tell you what the Yenta has been saying about you.

I am disabled so I can't go shopping. I use the internet to do all my shopping. My account was hacked and I called Discover and they took care or it immediately by taking the fraudulent charges and issuing me a new card. I watch my charges very closely since then and have had another charge that I did not authorize - a telemarketer. I would certainly recommend Discover it.

The professional, courteous, and friendly staff and the member benefits Discover Card provides should be an inspiration to all businesses in the U.S.A. They really do get it right, the first time, every time. And even though Ive never met anyone there personally, I can tell they do it with a smile. Please accept my thanks to all at Discover and keep up the good work!!
Easy to manage finances with this card. Great benefits and excellent service anytime I call Discover Card customer service for assistance.

Discover definitely has the best website, best mobile app, best customer service, best cash back rewards program, best rewards mall (i.e. they definitely have brought on more partners where people actually want to shop than other rewards malls). I've had a Discover Card for over ten years now. I wasn't using it for a long time, but they finally decided to offer competitive, if not the best, cash back rewards program. It has now become my go-to credit card. It seems like Discover is more widely accepted than it used to be when I first started using it ten years ago.

The only critique I can offer is there are not a lot of card design options, although I do like how the front of the card is flat without the raised card number and all the card information is on the back of the card. Very sleek. It would be nice if they could lead the way and embed chips (more secure) into their cards.
I love my Discover - best credit card I ever had, will never go back to the "others". Thanks Discover!

We have had Discover many many years in fact I believe it was about one of the first cards we had obtained after marriage. We have had excellent service from them over the years.

They offer good incentives and stand behind all their services and right on top of fraud protection for the consumers. Also their Wallet Protection is another one their great products.

If you are in the market for a credit card we suggest for you to take a look at theirs and compare all aspects and feel you will make a good choice. They are only a phone call away and more than willing to work with you for whatever needs you have.

DISCOVER what you have been missing!!! We did way back when! :)

Thank goodness was able to use, SURE DIDN'T WANT TO, but missed 3 days of work, always on time with discover payments or pay twice a month. Well DMV doesn't wait or goes up triple... one less worry for this week.. next week eeeks!!

good service, reward program.
I used it for on-line shopping, I earned good points.

I received a call from Discover asking about purchases and if I had made them. I had not. They caught it after only 3 transactions and made it VERY easy to resolve the situation. Their customer service is outstanding! Thank you Discover!
I wish we can pay public parking fee etc, by Discover, if it is safe from hackers. Thanks.
Love the ease of the website and all the benefits of the card. The cash back is the BEST!

Review Title: Excellent benefits and outstanding customer service
Review Text: In my opinion, Discover card is without a doubt the best card to carry when compared to most other cards. As an example, Discover is free of charges when travelling abroad. I would absolutely recommend this card to anyone who's looking for fantastic service. Thank you.

I've had the It card for about 1 year now and it is great. The cash back program is what brought me to the card and it is as promised. What sets the card apart in my mind (from my other cash back card) are the customer service and the web/mobile interface. The customer service (which I've only used a few times) has been excellent. Always prompt, courteous, and easy to work with. The web interface is very user friendly and easy to navigate. The iOS apps (iPhone & iPad) are the best of all my credit cards. So easy to get in, do what I need to do (check balances, see statements, pay bill, etc), and get out. Tremendous thought went into these (web and mobile) and for that I am very happy... My 2 cents.

As my first credit card, Discover gave me the opportunity to build my credit with them, while no one else would give me the chance Discover did, not also did they gave me the chance but their way of me letting me choosing when to pay has been the best thing ever. I do recommend Discover to friends and family. It did me great.

I got this credit with a bit of skepticism. However, it's by far the greatest way I have found to raise my credit score. I can't believe how fast it's rising, and I've been paying it off every other week! I also love the rewards program! It adds up fast!
This is the first time that I owned a Discover Card. I am very impressed with the service and the rewards benefits

I absolutely love the website layout. It is extremely user friendly and easy to work with. Customer service is always very helpful and it's wonderful to talk to a real person who speaks English! The Rewards Program was excellent in the beginning when it covered gas and restaurant spending but it's gotten a lot less practical and I haven't been able to receive any rewards from it in several months. Overall I still rate Discover as an excellent credit card service compared to the competition.

Good reward program, the only problem I find is traveling. There is no foreign exchange fee but the card lacks chip and pin which is required when traveling overseas. So I have to leave the card home which I hate, especially during the restaurant bonus quarters. American Express has the chip so I never leave home without it when travelling. Discover needs to play with the big boys get chip and pin.
Good services and responses. Recommended to two persons.

This credit card is so great! The cash back you get from this card is easily the best card on the market. The company has great customer service. And I love the online portion for this credit card - it makes paying bills and checking your account activity and statements extremely easy I love it!
I am very pleased with the Discover card. The cashback program is very nice and rivals other card programs.

Review Title: The best decision I ever made
Review Text: I absolutely love the discover it card. My wife and I use it like a debit card for our day to day purchases so we can get the cashback bonus. I've bought a lot of video games and movies with the cashback that I never would've gotten otherwise. So far we haven't had any troubles and it's nice to keep an eye on my credit score.

I've had Discover for many years. The customer service has been amazing; they're always helpful and the wait time is minimal. Initially, the rewards program wasn't optimal but the new 1% all the time + 5% periodically allows you to maximize on rewards. Added bonus: they approve almost everyone.
Discover makes it easy to use and manage the It card. Online services are easy and user friendly and the rewards program is also great.
I really have to say this.. cant ask for more; Exceptional service!

i love the way their website is organized - its simple to negotiate... the online mall offers big awards and of course, the anytime free FICO adds the icing!
member since 2014 but it only shows me till 2013!!

I wish there was a general annual reward ,like $50 for members of good standing every year.
thanks !
No the best card i have had, I like the free FICO. However, 5% all the time would be better. 1% is to low!!!
I have been using discover credit card for almost an year and i fall in love with it. They have a superior customer service which I really appreciate. Thank you Discover.

I recommend Discover Card to everyone(Student, Worker, Unemployed, New credit holder...) with Discover card you can get lot of deals, benefits, and and amazing customer service.
Should make their customer earn more points and make discover available in more locations and worldwide. Overall, i am satisfied dealing with them.
It is a smart looking card and easy to find. It offers rewards which I realy like. I would recommend this card to all my family and friends.

Review Title: Cash back, only when you have to complain about not getting it.
Review Text: My cash back is never correct causing me wasted time on fixing it with Discover.

Been a member since 1990 - and I use my Discover Card for EVERYTHING! So nice to have an itemized bill at the end of the month and make just one easy payment - and all the while I am racking up points for FREE STUFF! I use my points for gift cards - they make great gifts for everyone in the family, and friends. I have even used them for baby and wedding showers!

Review Title: They finally got it with Discover It!
Review Text:
I've always liked the Discover card 5% earn back program. My issue always was, if for some reason it didn't meet the 5% rules, you only received 1/4%. So I only used Discover, if another card I had wasn't offering 5% for the same category.

With Discover It, that concern is gone, because you now earn a minimum of 1 % on everything. So I definitely use this card the most of any card I have now.

overall my exp. and cust. sat. has been good to very good, I wish that you took a bit more time in training reps. on policy and how to make adjustments to charges, It seems to be 1/3 actually know the correct answer, like any other call ctr. If you ask 3 different people you get 3 different answers, one is actually correct. That's because personel turnover is too high, or not enough trainers, or both.
This is the best card that I've ever had. The information @ the home page is excellent.
When I was looking for a good credit card I was not sure which one to apply for. I am glad I picked it up, great rewards program and excellent customer service. I love it :-)
no review have been using discover cars for a long time
Always excellent service! A card we use for everything. Cash back program is super.
Life Goes on...with Good credit card and yes...OK>..

I use my Discover card constantly , only drawback I see is the high interest rate . That causes me to shy away from it's use and pay it off monthly to keep it at no interest. Great card with the one exception is all I can see.

My experience with the Discover It card has been nothing short of amazing. I've earned hundreds in Cash Back, the online services make managing my money fun, and I always feel protected when I use it to make purchases online or in person.

i like the dicover it card.. and ALL it's perks...

from cashback bonus..to participating merchants in

many of it's programs.....

i try to take advantage of as many things as possible...

cuz they R good things...

Review Title: awesome rewards card no annual fee Please and thank you!
Review Text: awesome rewards card no annual fee Please and thank you!
I love the great rewards this card offers. I've been a member for a short time and is enjoying this card. I use my discover it card frequently for my daily grocery shopping and for last minute items.

Review Title: Great Card But Limited Places To Use It.
Review Text: For the most part I like using my "IT" card. The service is excellent as is the website functionality. My only issue is when I go to use it about 10% of the places I go do not accept the card. I also travel and the card has very limited acceptance outside of the USA. Other than that it is the card I use most often when buying.

Review Title: Discover Card has been better than most other cards.
Review Text: In most cases I have found Discover Card to have a decent standard in most areas of my needs. I find their outstanding Service to been about 92% of the time. Sure, sometimes it doesn't work out so well with the problems, but in most cases they achieve a much better standard than any other card I have (22 accounts, apx/Excellent Credit. / Visa, Master, AMEX & one Discover Card#. I have other cards with Rewards, but often I just charge with my Discover Card being not concerned with another card which may have the same or better rewards offers. In general, I have been with Discover Card for many years. I disputed a couple charges with a company that was jerking me around. I provided all the information in detail. Discover Card did what they could, even said they did not believe the company and still gave me a credit back. I can only say when your with Discover Card that the majority of times you will be in good hands. A lot of other cards simply have a very poor customer service, never really answer a question, tell you to call back in a few months #Capital One is just like that so I just do not use their two card I hold at $10,000 credit line each#. Discover Card commonly will meet my needs when I call even with better APR or credit line increases #simply, I routinely pay them one or more times a month). I hope this may help someone decided with having a Discover Card. This my personal experience of being with Discover Card since 2006 apx.

Review Title: Good card but the 5% rewards program is problematic.
Review Text: Overall the It card is an improvement over the old Discover since it has the same benefits but all purchases get a 1% rebate rather than having to build up to that over time. My one problem is with the 5% offer. Even though you are buying things in the given category in the proper month, the vendor has to be listed in that category. So for example, I bought furniture from a place that lists their products as "merchandise" and I was therefore not given the 5% which I had expected. This has happened to me with carpeting and gasoline in the past. Obviously, the salespeople or customer service people won't know how their businesses get listed so this reward is a gamble.

This is the first credit card I have had. It has been going great!

I love that if I make a late payment, the first time my late fees will be waived. It is nice knowing that there is room for error. Do I pay bills late? No, but if something happens and I need to pay late I have a little wiggle room. Also, I love getting my FICO credit score with each statement. It is nice being able to see my progress especially since I'm in the stage of building my credit.

I also love the rewards with this card. There seems to be many options and I love that if I choose a card from a place approved by Discover, I can turn $40 dollars into $50. Thats a great way to get more from my rewards. I have't done that yet, I used direct deposit for my first $50 in rewards. Also, the variety of locations from which to choose gift cards is pretty good. There are restaurants, clothing stores, movie theaters, etc.

I like how there are special areas every quarter that earn 5% cashback. The options fit the time of year too: movies and restaurants in winter, gas in summer, online shopping during the holiday season. I made out great when it was cashback on all online shopping!

The online bill paying system works wonderfully. Sometimes processing is a little on the slow side, but I love that with a few clicks I can set how much I want to pay, on what date, and how often. It makes paying and being on time easy. There are also multiple features online that make financial tracking easier. I always review my spend analyzer and my year end summary report which helps me to budget and see where I'm spending the most money.

The only downside I have experienced thus far is that I have ran into a few places that don't accept Discover cards. I also have been told by others "Why did you get a Discover card? The places that accept Discover are limited compared to those that accept Visa or Mastercard." I have had this issue a couple of times in my area.
Client Response 1: Glad to hear you're a fan of our card! Sounds like you've figured out most of benefits and they're working for you. And about those places that don't take your card - keep asking them. Sometimes it just takes enough folks asking before they join the 9 million places that do. Thanks for sharing your feelings about our card - we really appreciate it.

Try and make it so that using the card at the store PERIOD you get the rewards. I visit the same store locally and get no rewards, but if you use the same company through the site u can get rewards. Not every purchase can be made online. So don't limit us.

Review Title: By far THE BEST credit card available
Review Text:
It all started when a friend of mine recommended this card to me (upon complaining about how awful my old credit card company was). I called to activate my new IT card and I spoke to one of the nicest and friendliest representatives ever! She answered all of my questions and signed me up with all the upcoming cash back offers. Discover definitely deservers an A+ when it comes to customer service!

But you wanna' know about the card itself, right? WELL, it's also awesome! Contrary to popular belief, Discover is accepted pretty much everywhere. Almost everywhere I go I can use this card.

Billing is also great! They always send me the paper bill on time AND I also receive paperless bills via e-mail, so there is no way I can miss a payment.... but if I do, they have a forgiveness program! I feel like Discover is totally on my side!

Last but certainly not least, rewards. Also, the best I've seen on any credit card out there. So far, I've gotten enough cash back to redeem coffee cards and video games. It really feels great to earn money by just by spending the amount I already do each month. Plus with the 5% bonus periods it adds up mighty quick. Especially since it is on things I buy anyways like gas, restaurants, online shopping, etc.

This is the best card I've ever had and I hope to do business with Discover for the rest of my life. I guess you can say that this was just my longwinded way of saying Discover, I love you!
What sets them apart is customer service, first and foremost.

I am new to the discover card family and so far I am loving it, the cash back bonus is awesome, and I love the fact that I get 1% cash back on all my purchases. The customer service is very easy to access and alwasy polite when dealing with customers. I have no problems with discover card so far and I hope to keep it that way.

Review Title: More Than Just a Marketing Campaign
Review Text:

Most recently I was warned I may have to wait up to eight minutes due to high call-in volume, but was connected to someone in under a minute.

Additionally, the website is intuitive and modern. The Spend Analyzer is not just a helpful tool, but also fun and interactive. I'm quite pleased with my experience as a Discover member thus far, and I can't wait to take advantage of the Cashback program.

Review Title: I cant believe it took me so long to sign up!!!
Review Text: I love every aspect of my Discover card. From the Cash Back bonus to the Shop Extras. Their customer service is superb! I had a new account and card in less than 24 hours. I also feel special when I receive small perks in the mail such as gift cards and special free offers. Keep up the outstanding work.

Review Title: Discover IT has it and more!
Review Text: After discovering that my previous Discover card earned .05% before a certain amount of purchases I was offered the Discover IT card. The card offers 1% cash back and 5% cash back incentives which include online purchasing during the holidays, gas and groceries, restaurants, entertainment, home improvement, and more. The 5% cash back offers are right in sync with how people normally shop, totally awesome. I rated the rewards program good versus excellent because I believe there should be a loyalty program for those who continuously use and payoff their Discover card every month. For example, 5% cash back for everything during the birthday and card anniversary month after 3 years. The card design is a plus, on the front people just see the Discover IT logo and the back of the card has all of your information so you are able to view your purchases, have a conversation with the cashier, and teach your children how to shop without feeling violated. The added bonus of having your transunion score printed on your statement is awesome, you get a month to month blueprint of how you are doing. Discover in general is a great company from the call center and knowing who you're talking to and where, the detailed website where you can do anything (especially the quick credit limit increase), and the ability to ask for a lower APR and to receive it. I have been a Discover card user since 2010 and it is the only card that I carry in my wallet (sorry Capital One but Discover had me at IT). Discover thank you! Now just to have you as an accepted form of payment everywhere so I can use you as my business credit card.

I happened to find out about the Discover IT card through a credit card forum awhile back, and was a bit reluctant at first cause of the fact that it isn't accepted everywhere, and because I've heard getting a decent credit limit was kind of hard. But I applied on the basis of it being similar to the Chase Freedom, but with the added ability of knowing my TransUnion FICO score every month(which is an amazing benefit), and it being really great for online shopping(which I do a lot of).
I applied for it, and some strange stuff happened & somehow I ended up apping for the Student Version. Despite being frustrated, I called Customer Service and was helped out greatly by the lady who answered. I got everything fixed, and she was very polite, professional, understanding. Not only that, but I was granted my highest credit limit(equal to my AMEX), and that made me even happier. Great customer service is something I appreciate, and so far Discover's has been absolutely outstanding. I seriously have to say their customer service is equal to the high tier AMEX(which I also am a card carrier of). My only complaint would be that the 5% cash back rewards categories haven't been very great for me. Other than 5% on restaurants, the others haven't been very useful to me(though I admit that this is just because of my particular spending/shopping habits. For others it might be really great).
However, even with that small complaint, I am happy to have this the Discover IT & the ability to see my FICO Score every month, a nice starting credit limit, and amazing customer service.

Review Title: If you report FICO, use a newer model and software than FICO 98
Review Text:
You are freaking people like me out. FICO 98 can't handle the new credit reporting guidelines that list your statement closing amount, payments and monthly charges. It takes the high balance for the month, which was not available when the FICO 98 model and software were released, and uses that as the closing balance. As a result, people will generally see a much lower FICO score than they really have.

Case in point: Discover's FICO 98 saw my 17.55% overall credit limit usage for the month of January as a big increase in credit utilization over the 9% total credit limit usage of the previous month and dropped my score by 12 points. FICO 04 used my statement closing amount instead and saw a slight increase in credit usage that dropped my score by one point. My statement closing amount was $30 greater than it was last month and well under 10% of utilization.

Keep in mind that I pay off my balance every month and all of my bills are paid on time or early. My statement closing balance is always less than 10% on my cards and most times at or close to zero. In other words, the only thing that changed last month was my usage of the Discover card. Absolutely nothing else on my report changed.

My FICO 04 score is 50 points higher than what is being reported by Discover and my FICO 08 score is 60 points higher. I'm sure I'm not the only one getting blindsided by Discover and it is disturbing to see the vast changes in score from month to month, especially in the wrong direction. It also won't help my cause to get credit limit increases on this card or help to bring it in line with the rest of my cards which have credit limits several thousands of dollars higher than this one has if they are using this old model to rate my credit.

Everything else about the card is great. If they ponied up to buy a modern version of FICO in their reporting I could easily give the card 5 stars. As it stands, however, the decision to report this antiquated number bothers more than helps. Please update your software.

1. I had a different Discover card previously and it allowed me to choose from a selection of different looks for my card. This card doesn't seem to offer that. The design isn't bad, but more customization would be appreciated.

2. The transaction/statement listing. One thing a different card does that is appreciated is show a points earning on a per transaction basis. This is really amazing and something Discover should consider implenenting.
The main reason for this ties into using ShopDiscover. Having this would mean I could check to be sure I'm receiving appropriate rewards for when I use ShopDiscover as a portal to a vendor. I've made at least a couple of purchases doing this, and so far I received an email from one of them saying I received bonus cashback from this and listed the amount but for the other I really don't have a way to check this.

Of course, neither of the above are going to keep from using the card and I still love it.

Review Title: Discover is great. The "Discover It" card... meh... no better than normal Discover
Review Text:
I've been a Discover card member for over 20 years. I love the cash back program. Discover is the first card I reach for when I am making a payment. The customer service is excellent. I love that I can always reach a live, English speaking customer service rep and the reps are knowledgable.

My only complaint about Discover comes in the area of security. They have discontinued service on my card several times because of "unusual" activity. Unusual activity can be transactions I do with the same vendors over and over. It hasn't happened as much lately as it did years ago when I first started using the card to run my business. I average more than 100 transactions a month and over $10,000 a month in business. So, my account is unusual.

I switched to the "Discover It" card because I was told it offered additional benefits. Frankly, I haven't noticed any additional benefits. The reward concierge thing sounds interesting, but I guess I actually have to call someone to use that. I haven't done it. The card is cool looking. It confuses some people because the account number is on the back.

Overall, of the major card companies, Discover remains my favorite. I highly recommend them.

Review Title: Does not live unto its word
Review Text:
Discover has several promotions going on, the entire web is filled with promotions on $150 cash back after spending $$$, I checked with customer service after spending the required amount and was told I did not use the appropriate link to be able to receive the bonus offer, The customer service was rude too.

The point I am not able to understand is when you have your offers published all over web why this change now? There have been similar reviews I have read on the internet about Discover.

I work for Chick-fil-A. And ask anyone what sets CFA apart from other similar restaurants and they'll say, "the service." Well Discover is the CFA of credit cards. First time I called customer service I was told who I was going to talk to, and where they were. The entire experience was pleasant and "human", if you get my drift. Highly recommended.

I never thought I would actually like a credit card. I figured they were just a necessary evil. Discover has changed that attitude, and I now expect much more from my other creditors. This is how you do business.
Excellent service and I love the fact you can see your FICO score.

A item by item report of all rewards, especially the 5% Bonus rewards should be available on the site. Check out BOA's site. There are times when you folks miss paying out the extra 4%. Calling up and reviewing all eligible charges is time consuming for both us and your people.
I encountered a problem with my credit union and my account was frozen till it got rectified.Discover was understanding and the person I talked to was pleasant and informative about my accont.

Review Title: This card is the best one out there!
Review Text: I love this card. Best customer service and I love the benefits. I also like the free Fico each month! The only thing this card is missing is 3% cashback on all gas. It would be perfect then.

my complaint concern the changing products each quarter. in my opinion a standard of 2/3 items which stay the same throughout the year would be better. such as grocery stores, gas stations, etc. a standard rate could be something like 3% for grocery stores, 3% for gas stations, and 2% for all other items. while I know that you are in business to let me earn some cash back this would be better as far as I am concerned. I have considered some other cards which give the common things that people use everyday or so. this could bring you people interested.
Very happy with my card choice. Great benefits and top notch customer service. Hats off to you guys.

The online account center is very user friendly and I pay my card off on here every week. I was pleasantly surprised when I got a thank you letter in the mail and a $5 Starbucks card a few months ago for being a good customer!
I am excited about cash back rewards! plan to use card all purchases and pay balance in full keep those rewards rolling in !

The only time I had an issue is when I was not notified of my threshold decrease for mobile banking, apparently they had lowered the threshold by about $250.00 without notyfying me about this causing my deposited check to place hold on funds avail for about a week, while the root cause was my fault it would have been helpful to know prior to making the deposit. Also setting up alerts helps you to be conciencious of your spending habits.

My threshold was lowered because my account went into the negative(no NSF fee applied) Gas purchase brought my account into the negative prior to direct depost posted the next day --again the reason why no NSF fee applied. Bottomline don't let your account go into the negative and bank responsibly.

Review Title: good credit card for good people
Review Text: I do like this discover card because of its durability and good terms also the good communication with the customer service is great .

Review Title: Better than most cards out there!
Review Text: I transferred an existing balance from another credit card during a promotion Discover was having after doing a lot of research on the different cards out there. I love the features it has such as 5% for the category you sign up for for 3 months (when I say sign up, I mean kind of register to receive that promotion), the categories range from movies, groceries, gas, home improvement and so on. The fraud protection is great, you get your FICO score every month on your statement so you can keep track of your credit, how easy it is to pay, customer service is amazing and many others this card offers. Oh I forgot to mention that you get rewarded regardless of what you buy every month because for all other purchases, you earn 1%. I would definitely recommend this card to anyone who wants great features, excellent customer service, and a card where you can change your billing date (which is super convenient by the way). Plus I love that you can design your card and that Discover even provides you with financial tools such as how long it will take to pay off your card based on the amount you pay each month and a spend analyzer which shows you where you're spending your money the most. Excellent cards, great features, cash back, incredible customer service and many more, what more could you ask for!

This card is the BEST card I have ever had!! I LOVE the FICO score each month, and the cashback bonus is fantastic at 1% on everything w/ 5% categories every quarter!! Everyone should have one of these cards!

Review Title: Great in the US. Not really useful while traveling abroad.
Review Text: Discover is a fantastic credit card issuer in the US. Great customer service and a really good experience on all its internet touch points. But while the IT card does not charge fees for foreign transactions, it is difficult to find vendors who take the cards without requesting a PIN. Customer service reps at Discover were not able to confirm whether such transactions would be consider as debit card/cash withdrawals, for which you would have to pay fees, or a regular credit card transaction.

Customer service is excellent. When you call you're told where your call is being routed WITHIN THE UNITED STATES. Every time I've called I've had very helpful customer service and talked to a person who could speak English without issue.
Overall, as far as credit cards go, this one is top notch.

Discover was helpful when I first joined I was able to actually talk to a person who didn't sound like they weren't in my country. I felt like I could have been speaking to the person next to me. The customer service was better then I what I get in person at my local store. Yet beside that I get my cash back bonus's for some of the simplest things like filling up my car, buying my books online, or even going out with my friends or boyfriend to the movies or out to eat. Discover's online viewing is fabulous it's far more easier to understand then other card brands. Review Title: Credit card that treats you right!
Review Text: Great credit card and service provided by Discover with the IT card. The rewards are wonderful and getting bonuses with tons of retailers makes shopping with the Discover card a no brainer.

Review Title: Discover Card is a great card
Review Text: I have had noo bad experience. Online account manager is easy to nabigate and use. Customer Service Reps I have spoken with provided accurate and helpful service. I have recommendeed it to others due because of the above experience.
The rewards program is awesome, and I can easily download my recent activity for 3rd party budgeting software. I love this card!
I shop AMAZON very frequently, I love that I can use my rewards so easy at check out. I would recommend to everyone who shops online almost exclusively.

Online account center is one of the best I have seen and the spend analyzer is a very nifty tool. Benefits with this card are on par with the competition. They are pretty good at identifying suspicious transactions - making sure you don't have any surprises on your monthly statement. FICO score is definitely an added plus. Customer service is kind of hit or miss. I have been able to do quite a bit online and the live chat people are great. I have only had to call in twice - both times to activate cards. Once I was on hold for a couple minutes then figured out I could it online. The first time I got a very pushy lady that kept trying to upsell me on a payment protection plan which I was very clear I did not want. Why i even need to speak to a rep on the phone to activate a card is a mystery to me as many other companies use an automated phone system. Rewards program is on par with the competition, however I would like a little more transparency in regards to how the cashback bonus is calculated. Both AMEX and Chase do a great job of showing the amount of purchases on your statement that have qualified for the different reward tiers. I have never been able to determine how Discover calculates this as it appears there is a bit of a lag between purchase and reward (not a full statement lag but yet not all purchases are factored in). It would also be nice to see some sort of relationship bonus. Maybe if you spend X number of dollars you get a small % of the cashback bonus you earned for the year as an extra bonus. Chase currently offers this for people who have checking accounts with them. Shop Discover is an excellent feature and one of the best around and a great way to beef up your cashback bonus balance. Bottom line is Discover is a great card to have in your arsenal, however the lack of transparency with regards to the calculation of the cashback bonus makes this a secondary card for me as opposed to my go to card.
Discover It has truly been a God send to me and I love all the services that they provide to me.

After many months of research, I finally decided to go with Discover It for my first credit card. I am 21 years old, with excellent credit and was immediately approved for a $1500 credit line. I love everything about this card, particularly the cash back on every purchase. It almost seems too good to be true, because I receive cash back for using my Discover card to pay for things I already pay for every month (utilities, car ins. , etc.) and it worked out great during the last statement which left my bonus up to my online Christmas shopping. I received more cash back than my minimum payment came due, which I just turned around and used my cash back bonus to pay towards my statement. Your online account is very user friendly, and I have contacted discover a few times with any questions I've had and the greatest part is...not only did I get someone on the phone right away, but they spoke perfectly clear english! So all in all, between the rewards program, the customer service and the online account center, I couldn't be more pleased with my credit card. As far as the built-in benefits, I simply have not used them yet, therefore I cannot give a proper rating on that aspect of the card. I would highly recommend this card, especially to anyone , like myself, who is young, trying to build credit.

I have several credit cards and this one is definitely the best. I love the cash back rewards you can earn. I have been a member since the end of May 2013 and have now redeemed over $300 worth of cash back. I prefer to use it as a statement credit. There are so many options out there. They are aware of anything suspicious on your account but don't over analyze things. It's pretty easy to get your credit limit increased also. I requested my limit doubled in November and was approved within a minute. LOVE THIS CARD!!!
Excellent features that I ever seen and rewards programm is good also.

I've had this card for 6 months and it has totally replaced my Chase Freedom card!! I've gotten so many benefits from this card, and since I don't pay interest (by paying my balance in full each cycle), its like being rewarded for shopping.
Love the cash back bonus and no late fees. The card is absolutely great!
I have not had any problems related to using the Discover IT Card
I downloaded the mobile app and I have access to my account at my fingertips. Easy to pay my bill from my phone as well.

I did quite a bit of research on credit card companies before choosing Discover. Discover offers the best benefits to its customers such as cashback bonus and having your credit score readily available on each statement. The customer service reps are very friendly and helpful, your concerns become their concerns as they treat them with top priority which is very comforting to know that your business will be handled properly and timely. The perks are great and all but what really made me feel good about choosing Discover is when the rep said "Welcome to the Discover family". Yes those words sealed it for me that I made the right choice. When I had a concern arise, their actions speak for themselves because they treat you just like family and want you to get the best Discover experience possible. If you are in question about whether to switch credit card companies or even make a credit card company your first major credit card, Discover is the way to go.

On-line access is very easy and quick. Calling customer service is great, the representatives are extremely friendly and eagar to assist. I recently got married and when I called to change my last name they send me a Discover gift card, very kind! Thank you so much!!

I used my Discover it card for nearly half a year. I compare it with my previous cards, and it always has the HIGHEST cash back rates! Furthermore, the cash back, from both 5% back and shopdiscover, are rather quick, usually less than two weeks. That is why I will recommend it to other people.
Rewards Program its Excellen like the experience with this card.
Having a discover card has been hasal free I just make more than min payment and my credit goes up . Great service

Review Title: I would recommend it to anyone.
Review Text:
I've had my Discover It card for 6 months and in that time I've had zero problems. From when it arrived and was activated through a brief, polite conversation, to the very easy to use website, everything about this card is great. Setting up online payments and making payments is really easy. I also really like the Cashback program. It feels great to get 5% back on a purchase.

Again, I would recommend it to anyone looking for a credit card.
Really awesome card along with the 5% cash back rewards program
customer service is great! the credit limit they gave me is even more great especially they increased mine! love the cashback and other benefits you get out of "it discover card'!!!
The new Discover It card has been great since day 1. I have called customer service a couple different times and they are very helpful and nice.
I find the Discover Card extremely convenient and I love the changing rewards program. Online payment and support system is excellent!
my only concerns, not everyone takes the card. I have nothing more to say about a card I just received last month.
If you want to enjoy real benefits, great costumer services and peace of mind, you have to have a Discover Credit Card.
Best card i have in my wallet. I won't use any other card.
I REALLY LIKE HAVING THIS CARD,IT'S HAVE A GOOD RATE A ITS ACCEPTED IN ALOT OF PLACES

Out of my five credit cards discover it is definitely my favorite- they raised my limit after only a few months and also started me out with a larger line of credit than any other company. Have only called customer care twice but both times the customer service was excellent. Highly recommend.
I always enjoy Discover card. Its truly loaded with lots of benefits, my fave is no foreign fee & signup bonus
Discover is the BEST. GREAT customer service to all the rep's.

Me and my wife applied for this card in April. There was no place we ever used it where we experienced any problem. Customer care service is excellent......Cash back rewards earning program is much better than American Express and Bank of America credit cards. I would highly recommend it to be considered while thinking about applying for any new credit card.

I've been a Discover user since 2000 and have made it my primary card. When they offered the benefits of the "it" card, I transitioned my "more" card over. I had no problems transitioning and so far have found it to be the same old Discover, only better! I look forward to seeing my FICO score every month on my statement.
Love my discover it card. For my first credit card services have been amazing .. If you don't have you're discover card .. You might want to discover it!!
I have not had this card very long. But what is offered is a great service. You must give the Discover Card a try. You won't re great it.
and easy. couldnt ask for anything more besides 50 characters.
I love everything about this card! Amazing customer service on the phone and you can really tell they are customer service driven with all the benefits that come with it!
Everything is very easy, love my Discover card!!!!

This is without doubt the most amazing card I have. I have moved away from my other cards in favor of this one. The customer service is second to none and you get to talk to a real person almost immediately. I have recommended the card to everyone at work and many of my customers. I will be with Discover for a very long time.

Best credit card I have used. Between the benefits and customer support, there really aren't any negative thoughts that come to mind. I would (and already have) absolutely reccomend this card to my friends and family.
Love the online banking option, very user friendly
I LOVE my Discover IT card and I brag about it to my friends and family. I highly recommend this card (and Discover in general) to friends all the time.
I am very pleased with my card. I like that I get my FICA score every month. I have not had any problems using it any where. I would recommend Discover to any one. Thank you ..
I love this card. It has lots of great benefits and it helps me to build my credit. Total win/win
in nutshell, they have thought of everything from customer's perspective.

I had another credit card with cash back bonus's and the Discover It card has better rewards then the other card did. I'm really happy with how fast my cash back is adding up. Would recommend getting this card if you are interested in the cash back.

I needed a credit increase, you did a standard review of the account and I got one. As a prior credit manager (Wells Fargo, Chase) I know how important seeing your fico is. I get it free with this account.
I love this card it has great cash back bonuses that makes it easy to use.

I just love the reactions from store clerks to the (still new) IT card. Many of them are confused with no raised numbers on the front-which I enjoy as it means these people Actually Look at the card. This action along with not flashing your account number means real added security.Then there is the 800 call in with a true live Thinking person to speak with*Hurray.
This is an excellent credit card and i love the outstanding service.

Review Title: Customer Service like it should be!
Review Text: Customer Service is the greatest we have ever encountered. So polite and professional. They don't sound like they are talking to you from a book or use canned responses.

Review Title: i have many cards but discover is my favorite
Review Text: i love all the benefits and fetures that come with my discover card my other cards just dont compare
Best credit card company, customer service goes beyond call of duty.

Going online to my account is very easy and Discover offers alot of good information. I love the rewards program. And I thought it was awesome that I got a $5 Starbucks giftcard on my birthday. Overall I have experienced great service. Thanks!

Superior customer service. I was late on a payment and was forgiven the fee graciously. Thankful for that. This card has been instrumental in re-building my credit history. No fees, great financial tools, and fun and profitable cash rewards program. Happy and having fun on my road to credit recovery!

I am very pleased with the way my card is received at the merchants I shop with, the rewards program is definitely a plus and, yes, sometimes my card use is influenced by the particular rewards program for that time period but that is MY gain. My experience with the customer service people has all been good-very friendly and helpful.
This is a great, user-friendly card. I definitely feel I made a smart choice going with Discover!

This company stood behind me after my husband died and was helpful when I could not access any money waived late fees for as long as
I needed to catch up with bill that accrued following his death.

THANK YOU
I love my discover card and all the benefits they offer

Review Title: we have always been happy with our discover card they are always there when needed to answer any concerns or even questions thank you
Review Text: discover card is the main card we use when charging things it's always been a very good credit card to have customer service has always been there for us when needed thank you

Review Title: A rewarding and great card for individuals and family spending
Review Text: Discover card is one of the best credits in the world. It has provided customers with their FICO scores. What a way to go.

So grateful for my new Discover It Card.
What a blessing it was when my application was accepted and I received my card via "priority mail" ! First Class Service!! Very impressed with your service. This card came at a time when I really
needed help and I thank God that Discover Card came to my rescue.
Wishing you tremendous success !!

Thank YOU, Discover !!

Grace Lane
Outstanding customer service! Great rewards program

I hate the rotating reward categories. Too hard to keep track of. and end up not using the credit card at all. 1% cash back is something every one in industry offers and nothing great about it. 1.5% is becoming the industry standard. Discover should come up something creating to stay ahead of the game. I need more reasons WHY I should use a Discover from my array of credit cards.
Overall I am very pleased with discover card. Cash back bonus is nice and most of all I love the pie chart feature in which you can see exactly what you are spending your money on.

This has been the EASIEST card to pay on every month. The web interface is PERFECT.
Not to mention....Every retailer I have been to accepts it!

Discover Card Has Great Rewards and 24/7 Great Service for the Customer. If you Pick Discover Card you won't need any other Credit
card.

Review Title: Superb Service and user Friendly website.
Review Text:
your website before was just as awesome as it is now. Very user friendly and so much designs and userfriendly ideas like the pie chart. I love the cards, both the original and the NYC skyline. I love that you keep extending my credit. You are just awesome and I love Discover.
thank you discover.

Easy to use, easy payments, just great. The rewards easy to redeem. Discover makes my life good.
